dmigs la gsol ba dang / las byed pa'i tshe gnyid kyis log kyang bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bya'o/ /ji ltar gnyid kyis log pa de bzhin du ra ro ba dang / snyoms par zhugs pa rnams
la'ang brjod par bya'o/ /btsun pa/ 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyis na/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bya ste/ bsnyen par
rdzogs par byed pa rnams ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ bsnyen par rdzogs kar mtshan 'phos na/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bgyi'am/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bya ste/ dge
slong ma'i nang du spos shig /mdor na/ smyon par gyur dang sems 'khrugs dang / /na ba 'on pa glen pa dang / /khyim pa dag la sogs pa rnams/ /bslab pa byin dang de ltar mtshan/ /btsun pa/
las bgyid pa smyon pas bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyis na/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ gal te las byed pa'i dge slong gis dge slong gi 'du shes dang ldan zhing gsol
ba byas la/ las kyang ma nyams na/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bya ste/ bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa rnams ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /de bzhin du sems 'khrugs pa dang / nad kyis gzir ba dang /
lkugs pa dang / 'on pa dang / de bzhin du ra ro ba rnams la yang brjod par bya'o/ /btsun pa/ las bgyid pa khyim pas bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyis na/ bsnyen par rdzogs par zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/

bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa zhes bya ste/ bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa rnams kyang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /de bzhin du ma ning dang / dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang / pha dang / ma dang / dgra bcom pa bsad
pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba dang / mu stegs can dang / mu stegs can du song ba dang / rkun gnas dang / mi gnas pa dang / so sor gnas pa dang / sngar nyes pa
byung ba dang / sngar 'khrugs pas las bgyis te bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyis na/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa zhes bya ste/ bsnyen par rdzogs par byed
pa rnams kyang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ las bgyid pa za mas bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyis na/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa zhes bya ste/ bsnyen
par rdzogs par byed pa rnams kyang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ las bgyid pa dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa dang / nye bar phyogs pa dang / bslab pa stsal pa rnams kyis bsnyen par rdzogs
par bgyis na/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bya ste/ bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa rnams ni/ 'das pa dang bcas
pa'o/ /btsun pa/ las bgyid pa 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pas bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyis na/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bya ste/ bsnyen
par rdzogs par byed pa rnams ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyid pa na las bgyid pa'i mtshan 'phos na bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bsnyen
par rdzogs pa zhes bya ste/ bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa rnams ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /mdor na/ spyon pa sems 'khrugs na ba dang / /'on pa glen pa gnyid log dang / /ra ro ba dang
myos pa dang / /snyoms par zhugs dang 'gro ba mtshan/ /khyim bdag la sogs pa rnams/ /bslab pa byin pa tha ma'o/ /btsun pa/ mkhan po smyon pas bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyis na/ bsnyen
par rdzogs pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bya ste/ bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa rnams ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /de bzhin du mkhan po sems 'khrugs pa dang /
nad kyis gzir ba dang / snyoms par zhugs pa rnams so/ /btsun pa/ mkhan po 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pas bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyis na/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/
bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bya ste/ bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa rnams ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ dge tshul pha bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyid pa na mkhan po'i mtshan 'phos na/ bsnyen
par rdzogs pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bsnyen par rdzogs ba zhes bya ste/ bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa rnams ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ mkhan po khyim pas bsnyen par rdzogs
par bgyis na/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bya ste/ bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa rnams ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /de bzhin du mkhan po
za ma dang / ma ning nas rgyas par bslab pa stsal pa'i bar du de rnams kyis bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyis na/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bya ste/ bsnyen par
rdzogs par byed pa rnams ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /'dul ba gzhung dam pa las/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dngos po rdzogs so// //mdor na/ phyed dang gsum dang bskor ba

dang / /bzhi pa dang ni mtshams dang mtshan/ /zhig dang snga ma mtshams dang shing / /dbyung ba mi rung khyim pa dag /dbyung ba tha mar smras pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis
zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshams chen po chod cig /ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ mtshams chen po'i tshad ji tsam/ u pa li/ dpag tshad phyed dang gsum mo/ /de tshun chad
ni/ thams cad kyang chung ngu ste/ dkyil 'khor gang du grangs bzhi bcu bskor bar shong ba'o/ /btsun pa/ dpag tshad phyed dang gsum las 'das par mtshams
bkum na/ de mtshams zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin te/ dpag tshad phyed dang gsum ni/ mtshams so/ /de las 'das pa ni/ mtshams ma yin no/ /de ste mtshams bcad na yang ma
bcad pa zhes bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyang 'das ba dang bcas pa ste/ de bzhin du thams cad shes par bya'o/ /btsun pa/ 'og gi mtshams gang lags/ u pa li/ chu yod pa'i bar du'o/ /
btsun pa/ dpag tshad phyed dang gsum las 'das pa na chab mchis na/ de mtshams zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin te/ dpag tshad phyed dang gsum ni/ mtshams so/ /de man chad ni/
mtshams ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ steng gi nam mkha' la mtshams gang lags/ u pa li/ ji tsam rtsig sgal lam/ shing gi rtse mo yod pa'o/ /btsun pa/ dpag tshad phyed dang gsum
las 'das pa na rtsig sgal lam/ shing gi rtse mo mchis na/ de mtshams zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin te/ dpag tshad phyed dang gsum ni/ mtshams zhes bya'i/ de yan chad ni/
mtshams ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ ri'i rtse mo'i mtshams gang lags/ u pa li/ chu mig yod pa'o/ /btsun pa/ dpag tshad phyed dang gsum las 'das pa na chab mig mchis na/ de mtshams
zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin te/ dpag tshad phyed dang gsum ni/ mtshams so/ /de yan chad ni/ mtshams ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ mtshams la yang mtshams kyis bskor bar gnang ngam/
u pa li/ mi gnang ste/ rgyang grags kyi mtshams dang / rtsig pa'i mtshams dang / chus bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/ ma gtogs so/ /btsun pa/ las bgyid pa 'phags pas 'phags pa'i
skad du mtshams bkum ba dang / dge slong de dag gis 'phags pa'i skad ma 'tshal na/ mtshams bkum pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bcad pa zhes bya ste/ las byed pa ni/ 'das pa dang bcas
pa'o/ /btsun pa/ 'phags pas mtha' 'khob pa'i skad du mtshams bkum pa dang / dge slong de dag gis mtha' 'khob pa'i skad ma 'tshal na/ mtshams bkum pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bcad
pa zhes bya ste/ las byed pa ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ mtha' 'khob pas mtha' 'khob pa'i skad du mtshams bkum pa dang / dge slong de dag gis mtha' 'khob pa'i skad ma 'tshal
na/ mtshams bkum pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ mtshams bcad pa zhes bya ste/ las byed pa ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ mtha' 'khob pas 'phags pa'i skad du mtshams bkum
pa dang / dge slong de dag gis 'phags pa'i skad ma 'tshal na/ mtshams bkum pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ mtshams bcad pa zhes bya ste/ las byed pa ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/
steng gi nam mkha' la mtshams dgum par rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ste/ u pa li/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mtshan ma bstan du med pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa/ nyi ma dang /

zla ba dang / skar mas mtshams dgum du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /u pa li/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / skar ma ni/ mi brtan zhing g.yo ba'i phyir ro/ /btsun
pa/ chu rlabs dang / chu rlabs kyi rgyud dam/ klung gi 'gram du ni/ mtshams dgum du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /u pa li/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar chu rlabs dang / chu rlabs kyi
rgyud dang / klung gi 'gram ni/ g.yo zhing mi brtan pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa/ de ste klung gi 'gram brtan par gyur na/ mtshams dgum du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ rdzu 'phrul
lam/ sgyu mas mtshams dgum du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /u pa li/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul dang / sgyu ma ni/ tha snyad du mi 'dogs pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa/ klung
ngam yur ba las mtshams bzlar rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ste/ de klung ngam/ yur chu rtag tu mi 'bab par gyur pa'o/ /btsun pa/ rtag tu 'bab pa'i chu gting zab pa las mtshams bzla bar
rung ngam/ u pa li/ rung ste/ 'di ltar yang klung dang / yur chu de la shing ngam/ rtsig pa'am/ re lde rnams kyis bkab par gyur pa'o/ /btsun pa/ de ste shing ngam/ re lde 'jig pa'i chos su
gyur na/ zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/ de ste sbyor ba btang na/ zhig pa zhes bya'o/ /'on te slar dga' bar sbyor bam btang na/ ma zhig pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ las bgyid pa mtshams gcod pa na mtshan
gyur na/ mtshams bcad pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ mtshams bcad pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ mtshams kyis mtshams dgrol du rung ngam/ u pa li/ rgyang grags kyi mtshams dang / rtsig pa'i
mtshams ma gtogs par gzhan mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ mtshams 'jig pa rnam pa du mchis/ u pa li/ lnga ste/ mtshams med pa dang / dge slong med pa dang / re ba med pa dang / gsol ba dang /
las dang lnga yin no/ /btsun pa/ sngon gyi mtshams ma bkrol par mtshams gzhan dgum du rung ngam/ u pa li/ rgyang grags kyi mtshams dang / rtsig pa'i mtshams dang / dkyil 'khor gyi
mtshams ma gtogs par mi rung ngo / /u pa li/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsol pa dang / las kyis mtshams gcad do/ /gsol pa dang / las kyis mtshams dgrol lo/ /btsun pa/ mtshams bkum
pas mtshams dgrol ba'am/ mtshams bkrol bas mtshams bkum par 'gyur pa mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ las kyis mtshams bcad na/ rgyang grags kyi mtshams dang / rtsig pa'i
mtshams dgrol pa zhes bya'o/ /las kyis mtshams bkrol na/ rgyang grags kyi mtshams dang / rtsig pa'i mtshams bcad pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ mchis pa'i rjes su mchi ba gang / u pa li/
mtshams so/ /btsun pa/ mchis pa'i rjes su mchis pa gang / u pa li/ mtshams so/ /btsun pa/ gnas bzhi'am/ gnas lnga'am/ de las mang yang rung /
shing gcig gis mtshams dgum par rung ngam/ u pa li/ rung ste/ ji tsam du mtshan ma bsgrag cing gzhag par nus pa'i bar du'o/ /btsun pa/ mtshams nas mtshams spo bar rung
ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ste/ rgyang grags kyi mtshams dang / rtsig pa'i mtshams ni/ ma gtogs so/ /btsun pa/ spo mi 'tshal ba'i mtshams du/ u pa li/ gcig ste/ las kyi mtshams
sam/ chu mig gam/ khron pa'o/ /btsun pa/ rung ba'i sa dang / mi rung ba'i sa'o/ /zhes bgyi na/ btsun pa/ rung ba'i sa gang lags/ u pa li/ gnas gang na mtshams kyi nang na rung ba'i
gnas su byin gyis brlabs par gyur pa 'di ni/ rung ba'i sa zhes bya'o/ /u pa li/ gnas gang na mtshams kyi nang du rung ba'i gnas byin gyis ma brlabs par gyur pa 'di ni/ mi rung ba'i sa
zhes bya'o/ /u pa li/ dam pa'i chos yod pa'i bar du ni/ mi rung ba'i sa yang yod do/ /u pa li/ dam pa'i chos med par gyur na/ thams cad kyang rung ba'i sa'o/ /btsun pa/ ji tsam gyis na/ dam
pa'i chos mchis pa zhes bgyi/ u pa li/ gang gi tshe nan tan byed pa rnams nan tan byed cing las kyang byed de/ nan tan du bya bas nan tan byed la/ las kyang byed pa'i bar du ni/ dam pa'i
chos yod pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ ji tsam gyis na/ dam pa'i chos ma mchis par gyur pa zhes bgyi/ u pa li/ gang gi tshe nan tan byed pa rnams ni/ nan tan mi byed cing / las kyang mi byed
de/ nan tan byed pas nan tan mi byed la las kyang mi byed pa'i tshe dam pa'i chos med par gyur pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ las bgyid pa khyim pas mtshams bkum na/ mtshams bkum pa
zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /de bzhin du las byed pa za ma dang / ma ning dang / dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang / pha dang / ma dang / dgra bcom pa bsad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba dang / mu stegs can dang / mu stegs can du song ba dang / rkun gnas dang / mi gnas pa dang / so sor gnas pa dang / sngar 'khrugs pa rnams kyis
mtshams bkum na/ mtshams bkum pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ las bgyid pa dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa dang / nye bar phyogs pa dang / bslab pa stsal pa
rnams kyis mtshams bkum na/ bkum pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ mtshams bcad pa zhes ni/ bya la/ dge 'dun rnams ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ las bgyid pa smyon
pas mtshams bkum na/ mtshams bkum pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ de ste dge slong gi 'du shes dang ldan la mtshan ma rnams kyang ston nus shing gsol pa'ang byas te las ma nyams
na/ mtshams bcad pa zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du las byed pa sems 'khrugs pa dang / nad kyis gzir ba dang / glen pa dang / 'on pa rnams kyang brjod par
bya'o/ /btsun pa/ las byed pa 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pas mtshams bkum na/ mtshams bkum pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ mtshams 'gum pa na las bgyid pa'i
dge slong dus las 'das na/ mtshams bkum pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ de ste mtshan ma bsgrags par yang rtogs la/ las kyang mang du byas bar gyur na/ mtshams bcad pa zhes bya'o//
u pa li/ de ste mtshan ma bsgrags par yang ma rtogs la/ las kyang mang du ma byas par gyur na/ mtshams ma bcad pa zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du khyim pa yin par shes pa dang / ma ning yin
pa dang / dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang / pha dang / ma dang / dgra bcom pa bsad pa yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba yin pa dang / mu stegs can dang / mu
stegs can du song ba yin pa dang / rkun gnas dang / mi gnas pa yin pa dang / so sor gnas pa yin pa dang / sngar nyes pa byung ba yin pa dang / sngar 'khrugs pa yin par shes pa nas/
de bzhin du 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa bdag nyid yin par shes pa'ang rgyas par brjod par bya'o/ /btsun pa/ mtshams 'gum pa na dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis par 'tshal ba dang / nye bar phyogs
pa dang / bslab pa stsal pa lags par 'tshal na/ mtshams bkum pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ mtshams bcad pa zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ khyim pas grangs
su bskangs te mtshams bkum na/ mtshams bkum pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /de bzhin du ma ning nas sngar 'khrugs pa rnams kyi bar du de dag gis grangs su bskangs te mtshams
bkum na/ mtshams bkum pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa dge slong za mas grangs su bskangs te mtshams bkum na/ mtshams bkum pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bcad pa zhes
mi bya ste/ dge 'dun yang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa dang / nye bar phyogs pa dang / bslab pa stsal pa rnams kyis grangs su bskangs te mtshams bkum na/ mtshams
bkum pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ mtshams bcad pa zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /mdor na/ mtshams dang rung ba'i gnas dag dang / /las gcig klung yang de bzhin te/ /
zhig pa dang ni gling gsum dang / /grong dang gsum pa de bzhin no/ /btsun pa/ mtshams kyi mtshan ma ma mchis par gyur na/ mtshams zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ zhig pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ mtshams
zhig na/ rung ba'i gnas kyang zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ zhig pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ las gcig dang / gsol pa gcig gis las bgyid pa phyogs gcig tu mchis te gnas bzhir mtshams
dgum par rung ngam/ u pa li/ rung ste/ ji ltar yang las byed pa'i dge slong des gnas bzhi'i mtshams su shing ngam/ dbyig pa'am/ re lde la mnan te mtshams
bcad pa'o/ /btsun pa/ mtshams dgum pa'i gnas su klung ngam/ yur chus mtshams non na/ mtshams zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ de ste mtshams kyi mtshan ma brtan po yod na/ ma zhig pa
zhes bya'o/ /de ste mtshams kyi mtshan ma med par gyur na/ zhig pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ mtshams zhig na/ chos gos dang mi 'bral ba'i sdom pa yang ma mchis pa zhes bgyi'am/ mchis pa zhes
bgyi/ u pa li/ yod pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pas ni/ las kyi mtshams su chos gos dang mi 'bral ba'i sdom pa skos shig /ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ rgyang grags kyi mtshams dang / rtsig pa'i
mtshams la yang chos gos dang mi 'bral ba'i sdom pa bsko bar bgyi'am/ de ste dgos par gyur na/ skos shig /btsun pa/ grong dang / gtsug lag khang lhan cig tu mchis te mtshams
'bral bar gyur na/ de la chos gos dang ni/ 'bral ba gang tshun chad bsgo bar bgyi/ grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs pa'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ni grong ngam grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs
bar chos gos dang mi 'bral ba'i sdom pa'o/ /zhes gsungs na/ chos gos dang mi 'bral ba'i sdom pa bskos pa las/ grong zhig der btsugs na/ de phyogs su chos gos dang mi 'bral ba'i
sdom pa zhig par 'gyur ram/ u pa li/ zhig pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ chos gos dang mi 'bral ba'i sdom pa bskos pa las grong gud du 'phos na/ btsun pa/ ci'i phyir phyogs der chos gos dang / mi bral
bar sdom pa bsko bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ mi dgos te/ sngon gyi sdom pa gsos pas chog go/ mdor na/ dran pa bzhi pa gsum pa dang / lnga pa dang ni gnyis tshan dang / /nyes pa gnyis dang skabs

'byed dang / /sems pa 'dug pa langs pa dang / /khyim pa dag la sogs pa dang / /smyon pa 'chad dang mang po'o/ /btsun pa/ dge 'dun gyis skya rengs shar ba'i tshe deng ni/ bdag cag gi gso sbyong ngo / /zhes dran

par gyur na/ dge slong de dag gis gso sbyong ji ltar bgyi/ deng bdag cag gi gso sbyong ngo / /zhes sems las tshig tu brjod cing / 'on te de na so sor thar pa klog na/ bklags pa zhes bya ste/ dge slong dag gis
gso sbyong yang byas mod kyi/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gso sbyong gi las rnam pa bzhi ste/ chos bzhin ma yin par byed cing ma 'dus pa dang / chos bzhin ma yin
pa la 'dus pa dang / chos bzhin la ma 'dus pa dang / chos bzhin la 'dus pa rnams so/ /zhes gsungs na/ chos bzhin ma yin par byed cing ma 'dus pa gang zhe na/ gang gi tshe so sor thar pa bklag par

bya ba de'i tshe mi klog /gang gis bklag par bya ba des mi klog /ji ltar bklag par bya ba de ltar mi klog /ji srid du bklag pa de srid du mi klog pa dang ma 'dus par gyur pa'o/ /chos bzhin ma yin pa la 'dus
pa gang zhe na/ gang gi so sor thar pa bklag par bya ba de'i tshe mi klog pa nas rgyas par ji srid du bklag par bya ba de srid du mi klog cing 'dus par gyur pa'o/ /chos bzhin la

ma 'dus pa gang zhe na/ gang gi tshe so sor thar pa bklag par bya ba de'i tshe klog /gang gis bklag par bya ba des klog /ji ltar bklag par bya ba de ltar klog /ji tsam du bklag par bya ba de tsam bklags

pa dang ma 'dus par gyur pa'o/ /chos bzhin la 'dus pa gang zhe na/ gang gi tshe so sor thar pa bklag par bya ba de'i tshe klog pa nas rgyas bar ji srid du bklag par bya ba de srid du klog cing 'dus par gyur
ba'i bar du'o/ /btsun pa/ 'phags pas 'phags pa'i skad du so sor thar pa bklags pa dang / dge slong de dag gis 'phags pa'i skad ma 'tshal na/ gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/
ma byas pa zhes bya ste/ so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa yang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /mtha' 'khob pas 'phags pa'i skad du so sor thar pa bklags pa dang / dge slong de dag gis 'phags pa'i skad ma 'tshal
na/ gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma byas pa zhes bya ste/ so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa yang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /'phags pas mtha' 'khob pa'i skad du so sor thar pa bklags
pa dang / dge slong de dag gis mtha' 'khob pa'i skad ma 'tshal na/ gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma byas pa zhes bya ste/ so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa yang 'das pa dang bcas
pa'o/ /mtha' 'khob pas mtha' 'khob pa'i skad du so sor thar pa'i mdo bklags pa dang / dge slong de dag gis mtha' 'khob pa'i skad ma 'tshal na/ gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma
byas pa zhes bya ste/ so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa yang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ sa la gnas pa'i grangs nam mkha' la gnas pas bskangs te so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa bklags na/
gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma byas pa zhes bya ste/ dge slong de dag kyang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ nam mkha' la gnas pa'i grangs sa la gnas pas bskangs te
so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa bklags na/ gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma byas pa zhes bya ste/ dge slong de dag kyang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ sa la gnas pa rnams la nam mkha'
la gnas pas so sor thar pa'i mdo klog cing gso sbyong bgyis na/ gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma byas pa zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun de dag kyang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ nam
mkha' la gnas pa rnams la sa la gnas pas so sor thar pa'i mdo klog cing gso sbyong bgyis na/ gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma byas pa zhes bya ste/ dge slong de dag kyang 'das pa dang

bcas pa'o/ /de bzhin du mtshams kyi nang na 'dug pa dang / mtshams kyi phyi rol na 'dug par lhan cig rgyas pas bzhir bya'o/ /btsun pa/ so sor thar pa klog pa la rnam pa du mchis/ u pa li/ rnam pa lnga
ste/ gsol ba byas nas gleng gzhi bklags te lhag ma rnams thos par zad do/ /zhes bsgrags pa 'di ni/ so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa dang po'o/ /gsol ba byas nas
gleng gzhi bklags te phas pham pa bzhi bklags nas lhag ma rnams thos pa'o/ /zhes bsgrags pa 'di ni/ so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa gnyis pa'o/ /gsol ba byas te gleng gzhi bklags/ phas
pham pa bzhi bklags/ dge 'dun gyi lhag ma bcu gsum bklags la lhag ma rnams thos pa'o/ /zhes bsgrags pa 'di ni/ so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa gsum pa'o/ /gsol ba byas te gleng gzhi
bklags/ phas pham pa bzhi dang / dge 'dun gyi lhag ma bcu gsum dang / mi mngon pa gnyis bklags nas lhag ma rnams thos pa'o/ /zhes bsgrags pa 'di ni/ so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa bzhi pa

ste| rgyas pa klog pa dang 'di lnga'o/ /btsun pa/ gso sbyong gi las la rnam pa du/ u pa li/ lnga ste/ bklag pa dang / mi bklag par sems bskyed pa dang / byin gyis brlab pa dang / yongs su dag pa dang /

skabs 'byed pa dang rnam pa lnga'o/ /btsun pa/ so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pas so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa klog pa'i tshe mtshan gyur na/ gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ byas pa zhes bya'o/ /
btsun pa/ dge slong phyogs gcig tu mchis pas gnas bzhir so sor thar pa'i mdo bklags la/ gso sbyong yang bgyis na/ dge slong de dag 'das pa dang bcas par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa
li/ yod de/ 'di ltar so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa'i dge slong de gnas pa'i mtshams su shing ngam/ dbyig pa'am/ re ldes mnan te so sor thar pa'i mdo bklags pa'o/ /btsun pa/ gnas gcig
pa'i mtshams kyi nang na gnas gcig pa'i dge slong rnams kyis phyogs bzhir so sor gso sbyong bgyis na/ gso sbyong yang bgyis la dge slong de dag kyang 'das pa dang bcas bar mi 'gyur ba mchis
sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ gcig gis gcig la dad pa byin pa'o/ /btsun pa/ so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa'i dge slong phyogs gcig tu mchis pa mtshams kyi nang dang / mtshams kyi slad rol na
gnas pa rnams la so sor thar pa bklags na/ gso sbyong yang bgyis la/ dge slong de dag kyang 'das pa dang bcas par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ 'di ltar yang so sor thar pa'i mdo
klog pa'i dge slong gis mtshams non te mnan nas mtshams su 'greng ngam 'dug la/ mtshams kyi nang dang / mtshams kyi phyi rol na/ gnas pa rnams la so sor thar pa bklags pa'o/ /btsun
pa| dge slong gis so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa lnga las gang yang rung ste/ so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa ma bklags kyang gso sbyong bgyis par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ skabs 'byed
pa'i tshe skabs 'byed pas skabs phye ba'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis tshig tu ma smras kyang gso sbyong bgyis par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ sems bskyed pas so/ /btsun pas 'khor rnams
ma langs/ dge slong rnams ni/ ma dong pa'o/ /zhes gsungs na/ btsun pa/ ji tsam gyis na/ 'khor ma longs pa zhes bgyi/ u pa li/ gang du dge slong bzhi'am/ de las mang
du 'dug par gyur na/ ma langs pa zhes bya'o/ /bzhir ma tshang na ni/ langs pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa bklags pa dang / stan las langs te mchis nas dge slong
mchis bzhin du 'tshal bar ma bgyis kyang kun tu ltung bar mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ bshang ba dang / gci ba'i sar song ste/ de yang thos pa'i nye 'khor las ma 'das pa'o/ /khyim
pas so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa bgyis te gso sbyong bgyis na/ gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ gso sbyong ma byas pa zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun kyang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /de bzhin du za

ma dang / ma ning dang / dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang / mi gnas pa dang / so sor gnas pa dang / 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa nas sngar 'khrugs pa'i bar du de dag ni/ u pa li/ gso sbyong ma byas pa zhes bya
ste| dge 'dun kyang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa dang / nye bar phyogs pa dang / bslab pa stsal pa rnams kyis so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa bgyis te gso sbyong
bgyis na/ bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ byas pa zhes bya ste/ dge slong rnams ni/ 'das pa dang / bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ smyon pas so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa bgyis te gso sbyong bgyis na/
gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ byas pa zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun rnams ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ de bzhin du sems 'khrugs pa dang / nad kyis gzir ba dang / 'on pas so sor
thar pa'i mdo klog pa bgyis te gso sbyong bgyis na/ gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ gso sbyong byas pa zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /ji ltar so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa de
bzhin du mang por bskang pa yang rgyas par sbyar ro/ /mdor na/ ma phul blangs pa dge 'dun dang / /bzhi pa dang ni gnyis pa mtshan/ /'khor ba dang ni gcig nas gcig /byin dang lam dang de bzhin mang //
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ dge slong gis dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa blangs te steng gi nam mkha' las re ba med par mchis sam mtshams
kyi slad rol du mchis na/ dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa ma phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma phul ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ de ste re ba dang bcas pas mchis na/ dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa ma phul
ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ sa la gnas pas nam mkha' la gnas pa rnams la dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa stsal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /blang du rung ngam/ u
pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ nam mkha' la gnas pas sa la gnas pa rnams la dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa stsal par rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /blang bar rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /
de bzhin du mtshams kyi nang du 'dug pa dang / mtshams kyi phyi rol na 'dug pa rnams la yang bzhir bya'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis dge 'dun thams cad 'dus shing
tshogs pa la dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa phul na/ des dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ phul ba zhes bya'o/ /sus rma bar bgyi/ sus kyang ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ dge
slong 'phags pas 'phags pa'i skad du dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa phul ba dang / dge slong des kyang 'phags pa'i skad ma 'tshal na/ dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa
li| ma yin no/ /'phags pas mtha' 'khob pa'i skad du dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa phul ba dang / dge slong des kyang mtha' 'khob pa'i skad ma 'tshal na/ dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa phul ba
zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /mtha' 'khob pas mtha' 'khob pa'i skad du dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa phul ba dang / dge slong des kyang mtha' 'khob pa'i skad ma 'tshal na/ dad pa dang /
yongs su dag pa phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /mtha' 'khob bas 'phags pa'i skad du dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa phul ba dang / dge slong des kyang 'phags pa'i skad ma 'tshal
na| dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis lus kyi dmigs pas skad ma brjod na/ dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa phul ba zhes
bgyi'am/ u pa li/ phul ba zhes bya'o/ /tshig gis smras la lus kyis ma lags na/ dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ phul ba zhes bya'o/ /lus dang tshig gis smras na/ dad
pa dang / yongs su dag pa phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ phul ba zhes bya'o/ /lus kyis kyang ma lags/ tshig gis kyang ma lags na/ dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma
yin no/ /btsun pa/ dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa stsal pa las dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa len pa'i dge slong mtshan 'phos na/ ma phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ gcig nas

gcig tu brgyud de dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa phul na/ dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ phul ba zhes bya ste/ dge slong de dag ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ chad
pa 'khor bas dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa phul na/ dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ phul ba zhes bya ste/ dge slong de dag ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ dge
slong gis dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa phul nas khyim par khas blangs na/ dad pa phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma phul ba zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du ma ning lags par khas blangs pa nas sngar 'khrugs
pa lags par khas blangs pa'i bar du rgyas par dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa ma phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma phul ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa phul nas
zam lags par khas blangs na/ dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa ma phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma phul ba zhes bya'o/ /de ste dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa dang / nye bar phyogs pa
dang / bslab pa stsal pa rnams lags par khas blangs na/ dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa ma phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa blangs nas
khyim pa lags par khas blangs na/ dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa ma phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma phul ba zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du ma ning lags par khas blangs nas sngar 'khrugs pa lags par

khas blangs pa'i bar du rgyas par dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa ma phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma phul ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa blangs pa dang / za ma dang / mi
gnas pa dang / so sor gnas pa rnams lags par khas blangs na/ dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa ma phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma phul ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi
dbyen bgyis pa lags par khas blangs pa dang / nye bar phyogs pa dang / bslab pa stsal pa lags par khas blangs na/ dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa ma phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /
btsun pa/ dge slong gis dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa blangs te dge 'dun gyi nang du mchis nas khyim pa lags par khas blangs na/ dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa ma phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa
li| phul ba zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du ma ning nas sngar 'khrugs pa lags par khas blangs pa'i bar du rgyas par dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa ma phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ phul ba zhes bya'o/ /
btsun pa/ dge slong gis dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa blangs te dge 'dun gyi nang du mchis nas za ma lags par khas blangs na/ dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa ma phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma
yin no/ /de bzhin du dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa dang / mi gnas pa dang / so sor gnas pa dang / nye bar phyogs pa dang / bslab pa stsal pa lags par khas blangs na/ btsun pa/ dad pa dang / yongs
su dag pa ma phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /gso sbyong gi dngos po rdzogs so// //'dul ba gzhung dam pa bam po bcu bdun pa/ mdor na/ bzhi pa rnam pa bzhi dag dang //
dngos po gnas gnyis de bzhin te/ /dran pa 'gro ba spangs pa dang / /'dug pa dag dang langs pa mtshan/ /khyim pa dag la sogs pa dang / /smyon pa dang ni chad pa grangs/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ skabs 'byed pa'i las la rnam pa du mchis/ u pa li/ bzhi ste/ chos bzhin ma yin pas skabs 'byed cing ma 'dus pa dang / chos bzhin ma yin par

'dus pa dang / chos bzhin dum 'dus pa dang / chos bzhin du 'dus pa'o/ /chos bzhin ma yin pas skabs 'byed pa gang zhe na/ gang gi tshe skabs dbye bar bya ba de'i tshe na skabs 'byed par mi byed pa dang /
ji ltar skabs dbye ba de ltar skabs 'byed pa de mi byed pa dang / ji tsam du skabs dbye bar bya ba de tsam skabs 'byed par mi byed pa dang / gang gis skabs dbye bar
bya ba des skabs 'byed par mi byed pa dang / ma 'dus par yang gyur pa'o/ /chos ma yin pas 'dus pa gang zhe na/ gang gi tshe skabs dbye bar bya ba de'i tshe na skabs 'byed par mi byed pa nas gang
gis skabs dbye bar bya ba des skabs 'byed par mi byed pa'i bar du rgyas par brjod de/ 'dus par yang gyur pa'o/ /chos bzhin du ma 'dus pa gang zhe na/ gang gi tshe na skabs 'byed par byed pa
dang / ji ltar skabs dbye bar bya ba de ltar skabs 'byed par byed pa dang / ji tsam du skabs dbye bar bya ba de tsam du skabs 'byed par byed pa dang / gang gis skabs dbye bar bya ba des skabs 'byed
par byed cing ma 'dus par gyur pa'o/ /chos bzhin du 'dus pa gang zhe na/ gang gi tshe skabs dbye bar bya ba de'i tshe na skabs 'byed par byed pa nas gang gis skabs dbye bar bya ba des skabs 'byed
par byed pa'i bar du rgyas par brjod de/ 'dus par yang gyur pa'o/ /btsun pa/ 'phags pas 'phags pa'i skad du skabs phye ba dang / dge slong de dag gis kyang 'phags pa'i skad ma 'tshal na/ skabs
phye ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ skabs ma phye ba zhes bya ste/ dge slong de dag kyang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /'phags pas mtha' 'khob pa'i skad du skabs phye ba dang / dge slong de dag kyang mtha'
'khob pa'i skad ma 'tshal na/ skabs phye ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ skabs ma phye ba zhes bya ste/ dge slong de dag kyang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /mtha' 'khob pas mtha' 'khob pa'i skad du skabs phye
ba dang / dge slong de dag kyang mtha' 'khob pa'i skad ma 'tshal na/ skabs phye ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ skabs ma phye ba zhes bya ste/ dge slong de dag kyang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /mtha' 'khob
pas 'phags pa'i skad du skabs phye ba dang / dge slong de dag kyang 'phags pa'i skad ma 'tshal na/ skabs phye ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ skabs ma phye ba zhes bya ste/ dge slong de dag kyang 'das pa
dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ sa la gnas pa'i grangs nam mkha' la gnas pas bskangs te skabs phye na/ skabs phye ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ skabs ma phye ba zhes bya ste/ dge slong de dag kyang
'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ nam mkha' la gnas pa'i grangs la gnas pas bskangs te skabs phye na/ skabs phye ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ skabs ma phye ba zhes bya ste/ dge slong
de dag kyang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ sa la gnas pas nam mkha' la gnas pa rnams la skabs phye na/ skabs phye ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ skabs ma phye ba zhes bya ste/ dge slong
de dag kyang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ nam mkha' la gnas pas sa la gnas pa rnams la skabs phye na/ skabs phye ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ skabs ma phye ba zhes bya ste/ dge
slong de dag kyang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /de bzhin du mtshams kyi nang na 'khod pa dang / mtshams kyi phyi rol na 'khod pa rnams lhan cig tu rnam pa bzhir bya'o/ /
btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang skabs 'byed pa de nyid kyi tshe dngos po ni/ yod/ gang zag ni/ med do/ /zhes gsungs na/ btsun pa/ dngos po ni/ gang lags/ gang zag ni/ gang
lags| nyes pa ni/ dngos po'o/ /nyes par byed pa ni/ gang zag ces bya'o/ /btsun pa/ tshig tu ma brjod kyang skabs phye bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ 'di ltar dge slong des
spring yig gam/ lag brdas skabs phye ba'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong zhig phyogs gcig tu 'greng nas gnas bzhir skabs 'byed na/ skabs phye bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod
de/ 'di ltar yang skabs 'byed pa'i dge slong des gnas bzhi'i mtshams su shing ngam re ldes mnan te skabs 'byed pa'o/ /btsun pa/ gnas kyang gcig /mtshams kyang gcig par lhan cig gnas
pa'i dge slong dag gis phyogs bzhir skabs phye na/ skabs phye bar yang 'gyur la/ dge 'dun de dag kyang 'das pa dang bcas par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ gcig la gcig
dad pa byin pa'o/ /btsun pa/ dge 'dun thams cad kyis skya rengs shar pa na dran par gyur na/ dge slong dag gis ji ltar skabs dbye bar bgyi/ deng ni/ bdag cag gis dbye'o/ /zhes tshig tu brjod
par bya'o/ /yang na ni/ tshig gsum pas skabs phye na/ skabs phye ba zhes bya ste/ dge slong de dag ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gnyen gyi don gyi slad du dbyar gyi
nang du skabs phye zhig /ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ thabs ji ltar stsal bar bgyi/ u pa li/ gang ring du gnas la skabs 'byed pa'i tshe 'ong mi nus pa'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis gnyen gyi don gyi

slad du dbyar gyi nang du skabs phye ste zhag bdun nam/ bzhi bcur yang rung byin gyis brlabs nas mchis pa las/ de ste skabs 'byed pa bco lnga pa'i skabs 'byed pa de nyid kyi tshe slar mchis na/ ci/ des

yang skabs dbye bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin te/ de la ni/ skabs phye ba des chog go /btsun pa/ dge slong zhig skabs 'byed pa tshes bco lnga pa nyid kyi tshe spangs na/ de dang lhan cig skabs dbye bar
bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang dge slong gi 'khor rnams ma langs ma dong pa'o/ /zhes gsungs na/ btsun pa/ ji tsam gyis na/ 'khor ma langs pa zhes bgyi/

u pa li/ gang du dge slong bzhi'am/ lnga'am/ de las mang yang rung ste 'khod par gyur na/ ma langs pa zhes bya'o/ /bzhi las nyung na/ langs pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ skabs dbye ba bco lnga pa de nyid kyi tshe
stan las langs te song na/ dge slong mchis bzhin du 'tshal bar ma bgyis kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ ji ltar dge slong bshang ba dang / gci ba'i sar song la/ de
yang thos pa'i nye 'khor las ma 'das pa'o/ /btsun pa/ skabs 'byed par bgyi ba skabs 'byed pa'i tshe mtshan 'phos te dge slong mar gyur nas skabs phye na/ skabs
phye ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ skabs phye ba zhe bya'o/ /btsun pa/ skabs 'byed pa khyim pas skabs phye na/ skabs phye ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ skabs ma phye ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun kyang
'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /de bzhin du za ma dang / ma ning dang / mi gnas pa dang / 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa nas rgyas par sngar 'khrugs pa rnams kyi bar du yang skabs ma phye ba zhes bya ste/ dge
'dun de dag kyang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa dang / nye bar phyogs pa dang / bslab pa stsal bas skabs phye na/ skabs phye ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/
skabs phye ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ skabs 'byed pa smyon pas skabs phye na/ skabs phye ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ skabs phye ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun
ni| 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /de bzhin du skabs 'byed pa sems 'khrugs pa dang / nad kyis gzir ba dang / glen pa dang / lkugs pa dang / 'on pa rnams kyis skabs phye na/ skabs phye ba zhes
bgyi'am/ u pa li/ skabs phye ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ 'phrin gyis skabs phye na/ skabs phye ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ skabs phye ba zhes bya ste/ dge
'dun ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /de bzhin du spring yig dang / lag brda dang / gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de skabs phye na/ skabs phye ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ skabs phye ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun
ni| 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ gzhan zer ro/ /zhes skabs phye na/ skabs phye ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ khyim pas grangs su bskangs te skabs phye na/ skabs phye ba zhes
bgyi'am/ u pa li/ skabs ma phye ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun yang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /de bzhin du za ma dang / ma ning dang / mi gnas pa dang / so sor gnas pa dang / 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa

nas sngar 'khrugs pa rnams kyi bar du sbyar bar bya'o/ /btsun pa/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa dang / nye bar phyogs pa dang / bslab pa stsal pa rnams kyis grangs su bskangs te skabs phye na/ skabs phye
ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ skabs phye ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ de bzhin du sems 'khrugs pa dang / nad kyis gzir ba dang / glen pa dang / lkugs
pa dang / 'on pa dang / gnyid log pa dang / myos pa dang / ra ro ba dang / snyoms par zhugs pa dang / 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa rnams kyis grangs su bskangs te skabs phye na/ skabs phye ba zhes
bgyi'am/ u pa li/ skabs phye ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /mdor na/ phul dang blangs dang dge 'dun dang / /bzhi pa dang ni gnyis dang mtshan/ /chad pa bral ba gcig
nas gcig /lam dang mang po de bzhin no/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis dad pa dang / skabs phye ba blangs te steng gi nam mkha' la mtshams kyi slad rol du re ba ma mchis
par mchis na/ dad pa dang / skabs phye ba ma phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma phul ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ de ste re ba dang bcas pas mchis na/ ma phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/
ma yin mod kyi/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa/ sa la gnas pa rnams kyis nam mkha' la gnas pa rnams la dad pa dang / skabs dbye ba dbul du rung ngam/ u pa li/ ma
yin no/ /btsun pa/ blang bar rung ngam/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ nam mkha' la gnas pa rnams kyis sa la gnas pa rnams la dad pa dang / skabs dbye ba dbul du rung ngam/ u pa
li/ ma yin no/ /de bzhin du mtshams kyi nang na 'khod pa rnams dang / mtshams kyi phyi rol na 'khod pa rnams kyang rnam pa bzhir brjod par bya'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis dge 'du thams cad
tshogs shing 'khod pa la dad pa dang / skabs dbye ba phul na/ dad pa dang / skabs dbye ba phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ phul ba zhes bya'o/ /sus bsgrag par bgyi/ sus kyang ma yin no/ /
btsun pa/ dge slong 'phags pas 'phags pa'i skad du dad pa dang / skabs dbye ba phul dang / dge slong de dag gis 'phags pa'i skad ma 'tshal na/ dad pa dang / skabs dbye ba phul ba zhes
bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /'phags pas mtha' 'khob pa'i skad du dad pa dang / skabs dbye ba phul ba dang / dge slong de dag gis mtha' 'khob pa'i skad ma 'tshal na/ dad pa dang / skabs dbye ba
phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ mtha' 'khob pas mtha' 'khob pa'i skad du dad pa dang / skabs dbye ba phul ba dang / dge slong de dag gis mtha' 'khob pa'i skad ma 'tshal
na| dad pa dang / skabs dbye ba phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ mtha' 'khob pas 'phags pa'i skad du dad pa dang / skabs dbye ba phul ba dang / dge slong de dag gis 'phags
pa'i skad ma 'tshal na/ dad pa dang / skabs dbye ba phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ dad pa dang / skabs dbye ba phul ba'i dge slong gis lus kyis dmigs kyi/ tshig gis ma
lags na/ dad pa dang / skabs dbye ba phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ phul ba zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du tshig tu smras kyi/ lus kyis ma lags pa dang / tshig dang lus kyis dmigs pas kyang dad pa dang /
skabs dbye ba phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ phul ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ de ste lus kyis kyang ma dmigs/ tshig gis ma smras na/ dad pa dang / skabs dbye ba phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/
ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ dad pa dang / skabs dbye ba 'bul ba'i dge slong mtshan gyur na/ dad pa dang / skabs dbye ba phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ chad pa bral bas dad
pa dang / skabs dbye ba phul na/ dad pa dang / skabs dbye ba phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ phul ba zhes bya ste/ dge slong de dag ni/ 'das pa dang bcas
ba'o/ /btsun pa/ dad pa dang / skabs dbye ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de smras na/ dad pa dang / skabs dbye ba phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ phul ba zhes bya'o/ /dge slong de dag
ni| 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /dad pa dang / skabs phye ba phul nas khyim pa lags par khas blangs na/ dad pa dang / skabs dbye ba phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma phul ba zhes bya'o/ /
de bzhin du ma ning lags par khas blangs pa nas rgyas par sngar 'khrugs pa lags pa'i bar du khas blangs na/ dad pa dang / skabs phye ba ma phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma phul
ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ dad pa dang / skabs 'byed pa 'bul ba'i dge slong dad pa dang / skabs dbye ba 'bul ba'i tshe za ma lags par khas blangs na/ dad pa dang / skabs dbye ba ma phul
ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ de ste dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa lags par khas blangs pa dang / nye bar phyogs pa dang / bslab pa stsal pa lags par
khas blangs na/ dad pa dang / skabs phye ba phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ dad pa dang / skabs dbye ba len pa'i dge slong gis dad pa dang / skabs phye
ba blangs nas dge 'dun gyi nang du mchis te khyim pa lags par khas blangs na/ dad pa dang / skabs phye ba ma phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma phul ba zhes mi bya'o/ /de bzhin du ma ning
lags par khas blangs pa nas rgyas par sngar 'khrugs pa lags pa'i bar du khas blangs na/ dad pa dang / skabs phye ba ma phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma phul ba zhes mi bya'o/ /
btsun pa/ de ste za ma lags par khas blangs na/ dad pa dang / skabs phye ba ma phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /de bzhin du dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa nas bslab pa

stsal pa lags par bar du khas blangs na/ dad pa dang / skabs phye ba ma phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /skabs 'byed pa'i dngos po rdzogs so// //mdor na/ gru dang nam mkha' gsum pa dang / /spyod yul the tshom song ba dang / /mtshan dang gsum pa gnas rnams dang / /dbyar gsum pa dang de bzhin no/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis
phur pa la btags pa'i grur dbyar tshul du zhugs na/ tshul du zhugs pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ tshul du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ de ste dbyar gyi nang logs su gru btang
na| dbyar zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'i dge slong zhig zhag bdun du byin gyis brlabs te steng gi nam mkha' las mtshams
kyi slad rol du mchis na/ dbyar zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/ dbyar ma zhig pa zhes bgyi/ u pa li/ dbyar ma zhig pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis steng gi nam mkha' la
dbyar tshul du zhugs na/ tshul du zhugs pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis steng gi nam mkha' la gzhal med khang du dbyar tshul du zhugs na/ tshul du zhugs pa zhes
bgyi'am/ u pa li/ tshul du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ de ste gzhal med khang de nas gnas gzhan du mchis na/ dbyar zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis gang spyod yul la brten te tshul du zhugs shig /ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ dge slong gis spyod yul ma mchis par dbyar tshul du zhugs na/ tshul du zhugs pa zhes bgyi'am/
u pa li/ tshul du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis spyod yul la brten te dbyar tshul du zhugs par gyur na/ ci/ des der zhag bdun du byin gyis brlabs te mchi ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa
li/ ma yin te/ des de nyid la brten nas dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis dbyar tshul du zhugs te bdag tshul du zhugs sam ma zhugs zhes the tshom za zhing dogs par gyur
na| tshul du zhugs pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ tshul du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ de ste the tshom dang dogs pa las the tshom dang dogs pa bsal ma nus na/ des slar yang dbyar tshul du 'jug
par bgyi'am/ u pa li/ tshul du 'jug par bya'o/ /btsun pa/ de'i dbyar gyi tshul gang lags/ u pa li/ snga ma'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis gnas 'dir dbyar gnas par bya'o/ /snyam du song ste

bsam nas gtsug lag khang zhig tu song ste de der phyin pa dang / skya rengs shar nas dbyar phyi mar gyur na/ tshul du zhugs pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ tshul du zhugs pa zhes bya ste/ des der tshul du 'jug
par bsam pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis gtsug lag khang zhig tu song ste gnas 'dir bdag tshul du 'jug go /zhes bsam nas des rkang pa ya gcig ni/ mtshams kyi nang du bzhag /rkang pa ya
gcig ni/ mtshams kyi slad rol du bzhag pa dang / skya rengs shar nas dbyar phyi mar gyur na/ tshul du zhugs pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ tshul du zhugs pa zhes bya ste/ des de ltar der tshul du 'jug
par bsam pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis dbyar tshul du zhugs pa na mtshan gyur na/ tshul du zhugs pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ tshul du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /des gnas der gnas par
bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin te/ dge slong ma'i dbyar mo khang du song la gnas par gyis shig /btsun pa/ dge slong gis gnas bzhir dbyar tshul du zhugs kyang dbyar tshul du zhugs par 'gyur ba
mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ 'di ltar dge slong des gnas bzhi'i mtshams su shing ngam/ 'od ma'am/ re ldes mnan te dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'o/ /de gang du gnas par bgyi/ gang dga' bar
ro| |btsun pa/ de ste shing ngam/ 'od ma'am/ re lde ni/ 'jig pa'i chos can du gyur na/ dbyar zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /des dbyar gang du gnas par
bgyi| gang dga' ba'i gnas gcig tu'o/ /de'i dbyar gang du gtogs/ /sems kyis gang du gnas par bsam pa'o/ /lhag ma rnams ni/ btang ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ de ste de phan chad zhag
bdun du byin gyis brlabs par gnas de nas gnyis por mchis na/ dbyar zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ dbyar zhig pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis gnas bzhi'am/ de las mang
ba rnams mtshams gcig tu bgyis te dbyar tshul du zhugs na/ gnas de dag thams cad du dbyar tshul du zhugs pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ dbyar tshul du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /des gang du
gnas par bgyi/ gang dga' bar ro/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis gnas gcig tu dbyar tshul du zhugs te de slan chad gnas gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi par dbyar tshul du zhugs na/
tshul du zhugs pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ tshul du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /gnas gang du/ phyi mar ro/ /btsun pa/ gang la dbyar gyi tshul snga ma yang ma mchis/ phyi ma yang ma mchis na/ de'i ming
ji skad ces bgyi/ u pa li/ dbyar zhig pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ gang la snga ma dang / phyi ma'i dbyar gyi tshul mchis la/ des kyang zhag bdun du byin gyis ma brlabs par mtshams kyi slad rol
du don zhig gi slad du mchis te slar mchis bsam na/ dbyar zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ dbyar zhig pa zhes bya'o/ /ci/ des yang slar dbyar tshul du 'jug par bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin te/
de yi dam las 'gal bas na/ nyes ba 'chags su chug cig /btsun pa/ ji srid du dbyar tshul du 'jug /u pa li/ zla ba gsum mo/ /btsun pa/ gang dbyar slad mar tshul du zhugs par gyur
pa des ji ltar tshul nas 'byung bar bgyi/ nam zhugs pa na zla ba gsum du gnas pa'i grangs tshang ba'am/ yang na rkyen zhig byung na yang rung ngo / /mdor na/ skya rengs bsam pa spangs pa dang / /gnas
dang shing rta ba lang khyim/ /shing dang grog po phug de bzhin/ /zhig pa 'gro yang de bzhin te/ /sde lnga dang ni bsam pa dang / /bdun po dang ni mi gnas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ dbyar gyi nang logs su dge
'dun 'khrugs nas der yang dge slong gis bsam bzhin du chos kyi phyogs dang chos ma lags pa'i phyogs la gnas na/ /dbyar zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ de ste lta ba sgrog bzhin pa
las skya rengs shar na ni/ dbyar zhig ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gi mdun du dbyar tshul du zhugs shig /ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ dge slong gis dge
slong ma mchis nas sems bskyed de dbyar tshul du zhugs na/ dbyar tshul du zhugs pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ tshul du zhugs pa zhes bya ste/ dge slong yod bzhin na ni/ 'das pa dang
bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong dbyar gyi nang logs su spangs pa de dang lhan cig gnas su gnas par bgyi'am/ u pa li/ gnas par bya ste/ skabs phye
nas ma gnas shig /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ni/ gang dge slong gis gnas 'di na bdag la dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang / ma lta bu 'dzin pa'i dge slong de lta bu dag gis
the tshom ma skyes pa dag ni/ mi skyed/ the tshom skyes pa ni/ sel bar byed/ yod dam med pa'i gnas rtogs la dbyar tshul du zhugs shig /ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ mdo sde 'dzin
pa dang / ma lta bu 'dzin pa ma mchis par dbyar tshul du 'jug tu rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa ma mchis par dbyar tshul du 'jug tu rung ngam/ u
pa li/ mi rung ngo / /de ste btsun pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa ma mchis na/ so sor thar pa'i mdo 'don pa'i dge slong btsal 'tshal lam/ so sor thar pa 'don pa med na/ dbyar tshul du 'jug
tu mi gnang ngo / /btsun pa/ shing rta spyod pa'i khyim mam/ ba lang rdzi'i khyim du gnas te dbyar tshul du 'jug tu rung ngam/ u pa li/ de ste des 'di snyam du dbyar tshul gnas 'di nas gung
du mi 'dong bar des bsam na/ rung ngo / /btsun pa/ de ste tshul du zhugs pa las dong na/ dbyar zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ shing drung ngam/ ri brag gam/
phug gam/ spyil por dbyar tshul du 'jug tu rung ngam/ u pa li/ rung ngo / /btsun pa/ dge slong gis don zhig gi slad du zhag bdun nam bzhi bcur byin gyis brlabs te mchis pa las/ de yang dus
'das par gyur na/ zhag bdun nam bzhi bcur byin gyis brlabs pa de zhig ces bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin te/ don gzhan gyi zad par gyis shig /btsun pa/ dge slong gis zhag bdun na
skabs 'byed par 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas byin gyis ma brlabs par mchis na/ dbyar zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ dbyar zhig pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ de ste zhag drug gam/ lnga'am/ bzhi'am/
gcig na tshul nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas byin gyis brlabs par mchis na/ dbyar zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ dbyar zhig pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhag
bdun du byin gyis rlobs la song shig /ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ gang gis byin gyis brlab par bgyi/ u pa li/ sde lngas so/ /gang du byin gyis brlab par bgyi/ mtshams kyi nang du'o/ /ji ltar
byin gyis brlab par bgyi/ sems bskyed la tshig tu brjod par bya ste/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba mtshams kyi nang gi gnas 'dir dbyar snga ma gsum tshul du zhugs te bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba
don 'di lta bu'i phyir mtshams kyi slad rol du mchi bar byin gyis brlabs te bdag gi dbyar ni/ 'di nyid de/ dbyar 'di nyid du gnas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ gang gi don du byin gyis brlab par bgyi/ u
pa li| sde bdun gyi phyir ro/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ni/ zhag bzhi bcu'i sdom pa stsol cig /ces gsungs na/ gang la stsal bar bgyi/ u pa li/ sde lnga
la'o| |btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ni/ dge 'dun gyi don gyi slad du ni/ zhag bzhi bcu'i sdom pa byin cig /ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge slob ma dang /
dge tshul ma dang / dge tshul pha dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / dge bsnyen pha dang / bsnyen gnas 'di las slad rol gyi mu stegs can dge sbyong gzhan bram ze dang / spyod pa pa kun tu rgyu ba rnams kyi
don gyi slad du zhag bzhi bcu'i sdom pa stsal bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ rung ngo / /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ni/ /zhag bzhi bcur bsko bar bya'o/ /zhes gsungs na/ btsun pa/ zhag
sum cu rtsa dgu'am/ zhag sum cu'am/ zhag nyi shur bsko bar rung ngam/ u pa li/ rung ngo / /btsun pa/ zhag bzhi bcu'i steng du yang zhag sum cu rtsa dgu'am/ zhag sum cu'am/ zhag nyi
shu'am/ zhag bcu'am/ zhag bdun du bskor bar rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ zhag sum cu rtsa dgu'i steng du zhag sum cu'am/ zhag nyi shu'am/ zhag bcu'am/ zhag bdun
du bsko bar rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ zhag bzhi bcu'i steng du zhag bdun du byin gyis brlab tu rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /u pa li/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mtshams kyi

nang du ni/ zhag mang du gnas par bya'o/ /mtshams kyi phyi rol tu ni/ zhag nyung ngu gnas par bya'o/ /btsun pa/ zhag sum rtsa dgu'i steng du zhag bdun du byin gyis brlab tu rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo //
btsun pa/ zhag sum cu'am/ nyi shu'am/ zhag bdun gyi steng du zhag bdun du byin gyis brlab tu rung ngam/ u pa li/ rung ngo / /btsun pa/ zhag bdun gyi steng du zhag bzhi bcur bsko bar rung ngam/ u

pa li/ mi rung ngo / /u pa li/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mtshams kyi nang du ni/ zhag mang du gnas par bya'o/ /mtshams kyi phyi rol tu ni/ zhag nyung du gnas par bya'o/ /btsun pa/ zhag bdun gyi steng du zhag
sum cu rtsa dgur bsko bar rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ zhag bdun gyi steng du zhag sum cu'am/ zhag nyi shu'am/ zhag bcu'am/ zhag bdun du bskor rung ngam/ u pa li/ rung ngo / /btsun
pa| dge slong dbyar tshul du zhugs pa las slob dpon dang / mkhan po dus bgyis nas des gnas bca' ba ma rnyed de mchis na/ de dbyar zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ dbyar zhig pa zhes
bya'o| |dbyar gyi dngos po rdzogs so// //mdor na/ lham gnyis pags pa rnam gnyis dang / /dom lpags yang na mjug ma dang / /mal stan mtho dang mal stan che/ /lham yu
can dang shing lham mo/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lham mi rung ba rnam pa lnga ma 'chang zhig /ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ gzhan yang gcan gzan mi sun pa dang / ba lang ngan pa dang / rta ngan
pa gzhan dag kyang mchis na/ de dag gi pags pa'i lham yang bcang bar mi bgyi'am/ u pa li/ lham de dag kyang ma 'chang zhig /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
khyim pas bgos pa'i lham dman ma bor ba chongs shig /ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ dge slong khyim pas bor ba'i lham dman ma bcangs kyang nongs pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba mchis sam/
u pa li/ yod de/ /'di ltar yang dge slong des thams cad ri mo can nam/ gser gyis brgyan pa'am/ dngul gyis brgyan pa bcangs pa'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis mi rung ba rnam pa lnga bcangs
kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ 'di ltar yang des ri dwags phra mo'am/ klus 'jig par gyur na'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis pags pa ma
'chang zhig /pags pa'i steng du ma 'dug cig /ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ ji tsam gyis pags pa'i steng du 'dug pa zhes bgyi/ u pa li/ ji tsam rkub tshos bzhag par gyur pa'o/ /btsun pa
ji tsam gyis na/ nyal ba zhes bgyi/ u pa li/ lus kyis 'phres pa'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis pags pa ma 'chang zhig /ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ dge slong
gis pags pa bcangs kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ nad pas ni/ pags pa chongs shig /mi na bas ni/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
dom gyi pags pa chongs shig /ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ ci/ nad pas bcang bar bgyi'am/ 'on te mi na bas kyang bcang bar bgyi/ u pa li/ na ba dang / mi na ba gnyis kas chongs shig
btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mjug ma lnga la 'jus te klung rgol cig /ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ rkang pa bzhi pa gzhan dag kyang mchis na/ de dag gi las rgal bar yang rung ngam/ u
pa li/ rgol cig /btsun pa/ de ste pho ma mchis na/ mo'i las rgal bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ de ni/ bar chad cig byung na/ rgal bar bya'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong
mal stan mthon por ma 'dug cig /ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ mal stan mthon po'i tshad ji tsam/ bde bar gshegs pa'i sor brgyad las lhag pa ni/ mal stan mthon po'o/ /btsun
pa| bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams mal stan mtho zhing che ba lam 'dug cig /ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ dge slong mal stan mtho zhing che ba la mchis kyang nongs par mi 'gyur
ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ /lha'i khyim dang / klu'i khyim dang / gnod sbyin gyi khyim dang / rgyal po'i khyim dang / rgyal po'i blon po'i khyim de dag tu stan gzhan med na'o/ /btsun
pa| dge slong gis bzhon pa la 'tshal na/ nongs pa gsum du 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ 'di ltar yang bzhon pa de mo yin pa dang / gser gyis brgyan par gyur pa'o//
btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ljongs kha ba can du lham yu ba can chongs shig /ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ dge slong gis de las gzhan pa'i ljongs su lham
yu ba can bcangs kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ gang du lham yu ba can med na/ 'tsho bar mi nus pa'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis
shing lham ma 'chang zhig /ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ dge slong gis shing lham bcangs kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ /chu yod pa'i yul chus
gang bas shing lham med par 'gro bar mi nus pa der ro/ /pags pa'i dngos po rdzogs so// //mdor na/ sman gnyis lan tshwa rnam pa gnyis/ /mar la rnam gnyis
de bzhin te/ /sa dang btsos dang bu ram dang / /'bru mar phan pa tha ma'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ sman de nyid snga dro'i lags la/
de nyid slad dro'i yang lags/ de nyid zhag bdun pa'i yang lags/ de nyid nam 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba lags par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ u pa li/ bu ram shing
ni/ snga dro'i 'o/ /khu ba ni/ phyi dro'i 'o/ /bu ram ni/ zhag bdun pa'i 'o/ /bsregs pa'i thal ba ni/ nam 'tsho'i bar du'o/ /u pa li/ zho ni/ snga dro'i 'o/ chu ni/ phyi dro'i 'o/ /mar ni/ zhag bdun
pa'i 'o/ /bsregs pa'i thal ba ni/ nam 'tsho'i bar du'o/ /u pa li/ sha ni/ snga dro'i 'o/ /zhag ni/ zhag bdun pa'i 'o/ /bsregs pa'i thal pa ni/ nam 'tsho'i bar du'o/ /u pa li/ 'bru ni/ snga dro'i

'o| |'bru mar ni/ zhag bdun pa'i 'o/ /bsregs pa'i thal ba ni/ nam 'tsho'i bar du'o/ /btsun pa/ snga dro ba dang / phyi dro ba dang / zhag bdun pa dang / nam 'tsho'i bar gyi sman 'di dag rnams phan tshun
'dres na/ 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ blangs pa dang / byin len ma bgyis pa dang / blangs pa la byin len bgyis pa dang / nang du bzhag pa dang / nang du btsos pa dang /

rang gis btsos pa'i rnams 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ dge slong gis snga dro'i dang / slad dro'i dang / zhag bdun pa'i dang / nam 'tsho'i bar gyi sman gang lags pa de dag blangs
pa dang / byin len ma bgyis pa dang / blangs pa la byin len bgyis pa dang / nang du bzhag pa dang / nang du btsos pa dang / rang gis btsos pa dang / dge slong gis btsos pa'i rnams 'tshal na/ cir
'gyur/ nyes byas so/ /btsun pa/ dge slong mas snga dro ba'i dang / slad dro ba'i dang / zhag bdun pa'i dang / nam 'tsho'i bar gyi sman gang lags pa de dag blangs pa dang / byin len ma bgyis pa
dang / blangs pa la byin len byas pa dang / nang du bzhag pa dang / nang du btsos pa dang / rang gis btsos pa dang / dge slong mas btsos pa rnams 'tshal na/ cir 'gyur/ nyes byas so/ /btsun
pa| dge slong gis blangs pa la byin len bgyis pa dang / nang du bzhag pa dang / nang du btsos pa dang / rang gis btsos pa dang / dge slong gis btsos pa 'tshal
ba na mtshan 'phos te dge slong mar gyur na/ cir 'gyur/ nyes byas so/ /btsun pa/ dge slong mas blangs pa la byin len bgyis dang / nang du bzhag pa dang / nang du btsos pa dang / rang gis
btsos pa dang / dge slong mas btsos pa 'tshal ba na mtshan 'phos te dge slong phar gyur na/ cir 'gyur/ nyes byas so/ /btsun pa/ snga dro ba gang lags pa dang / slad dro ba gang lags
pa dang / zhag bdun pa gang lags pa dang / nam 'tsho'i bar gyi sman rnams gang lags pa phan tshun 'dres te ma phye na/ nam 'tsho'i bar du byin gyis brlab tu rung ngam/ u pa li/

mi rung ste/ snga dro ba dang / phyi dro ba dang / zhag bdun pa de rnams kyis nam 'tsho'i bar du bya ba byar mi rung ste/ byin gyis brlab tu mi rung ngo / /de ste yang snga dro ba'i dang / phyi dro ba'i dang /
zhag bdun pa'i rnams dbye bar nus na/ byin gyis brlab tu rung ngam/ btsun pa/ mi rung ba zhig gis lan tshwa btsos nas 'tshal bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ mi na bas bza' bar mi
bya'o| |sha las btsos pa'am/ mar las btsos pa'am/ 'bru mar las btsos pa yang de bzhin no/ /btsun pa/ mi rung ba'i lan tshwas 'bru mar ram/ mar btsos pa 'tshal du
rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ mar ram/ 'bru mar chang dang lhan cig btsos pa 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ bzar rung ngo / /btsun pa/ mar ram/ 'bru mar chang dang lhan cig
tu 'dres par gyur pa 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ rung ngo / /btsun pa/ chang gis spangs pa'i sman 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ na ba la ni/ rung gi /mi na ba la ni/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ mi

rung ba'i sa la shing zhig skyes la/ mi rung ba'i sar 'bras bu zhig lhung na/ 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /mi rung ba'i sa la shing zhig skyes la rung ba'i sar 'bras bu lhung na/ 'tshal

du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /rung ba'i sa la shing zhig skyes la/ mi rung ba'i sar 'bras bu lhung na/ 'tshal du rung ngam/ de ste zhag gcig lon par ma gyur na ni/ bza' bar bya'o/ /rung ba'i sa la
shing zhig skyes la rung ba'i sar 'bras bu lhung na/ 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ bzar rung ngo / /rung ba'i sa na zhugs mchis la/ mi rung ba'i sa na mchis bas zhugs sam/ zhugs lce'am/
zhugs lce chad pas rung bar bgyid na/ rung zhes bgyi'am/ bgyis pa zhes brjod dam/ 'tshal bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /rung pa'i sa na zhugs mchis la/ mi rung ba'i sa na
mchis pas zhugs su bcug na/ rung zhes bgyi'am/ bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /mi rung ba'i sa na zhugs mchis la/ rung ba'i sa na mchis pas zhugs
sam| zhugs lce'am/ zhugs lce chad pas rung bar bgyis na/ rung bar bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ rung bar byas pa zhes bya ste/ bza' bar bya'o/ /mi rung
ba'i sa na zhugs mchis la/ rung ba'i sa na mchis pas zhugs su stsal na/ rung bar bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ rung bar byas pa zhes bya'o/ /'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ bza' bar bya'o/ /mi
rung ba'i sa na sgyed pu gsum mchis la/ rung ba'i sa na zhugs mchis pa'i zhugs lce des bsgral du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /mi rung ba'i sa na zhugs mchis la rung ba'i sa na sgyed
pu gnyis mchis pa dang / mi rung ba'i sa na sgyed pu gcig mchis pa zhugs lce des bsgral na/ 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /mi rung ba'i sa na sgyed bu gcig mchis la/ rung
ba'i sa na zhugs mchis pa de'i zhugs lces bsgral na/ de 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /rung ba'i sa na zhugs mchis la rung ba'i sa na sgyed bu gnyis mchis pa dang / mi rung
pa'i sa na sgyed pu gcig mchis la zhugs lce des bsgral na/ 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ bza' bar bya'o/ /rung ba'i sa na sgyed pu gsum mchis la rung ba'i sa na zhugs mchis na zhugs
lce des bsgral na/ 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ rung ngo / /btsun pa/ dge slong gis sa bon gyi rigs lnga la zhugs sam/ mtshon tam/ sen mos rung bar bgyid na/ rung bar bgyis
pa zhes bgyi'am/ rung bar byas pa zhes bya ste/ rung bar byas pas na/ bza' bar bya'o/ /mes rung bar byas pa ma gtogs te/ lhag ma rnams ni/ bza' bar bya'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis btung ba rnam pa brgyad 'thung zhig /ces gsungs na/ rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / lo ma dang / 'bras bu dang / bsngal bar bsres pa 'di dag 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ rung ngo / /btsun
pa| bu ram chab dgung bdun du byin gyis brlab tu rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /ji srid du btung bar bgyi/ dngos por ma gyur pa'i bar du'o/ /btsun pa/ mi rung ba'i sman 'bru mar du bsgral ba
'tshal bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ nad pa'i g.yog ji ltar bgyi/ ston pa'i 'du shes pas sman phan pa dang mthun pas g.yog bya'o/ /btsun pa/ nad pa la ci stsal bar bgyi/
u pa li/ rang bzhin gyis kha na ma tho ba ma gtogs par gang gis nad pa sos par 'gyur ba de dag byin cig /mdor na/ 'ug pa 'ol ba bya rgod dang / /bya rog kang+ka chu skyar mo/ /mi ro za'i bya rnams

dang / /sen mo mchu stobs gang ldan pa'o/ /btsun pa/ 'ug pa'i sha 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /'ol ba'i sha dang / bya rgod kyi sha dang / bya rog gi sha dang / bya kang+ka'i sha dang / chu
skyar mo'i sha dang / gzhan yang mi ro 'tshal ba rnams dang / sen mo dang / mchu stobs dang ldan pa'i sha 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /mdor na/ kan+tu dang ni pad pa
dang / /srin bu sbal pa'ang de bzhin te/ /sre mo sbrul dang go d+ha dang / /sbal pa dkar po rnga mo sram/ /btsun pa/ srog chags kan+tu'i sha 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa

li| mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ pad pa'i sha dang / sbal pa'i sha dang / sre mo'i sha dang / sbrul gyi sha dang / go d+ha'i sha dang / sbal pa dkar po'i sha dang / sram gyi sha dang / bya rog gi sha dang /
gzhan yang chu na gnas pa dang / sen mo dang mche ba'i stobs dang ldan pa dang / gzhan yang mi ro za ba de dag gi sha 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /mdor na/ bal glang dang
yang wa dang rta/ /spre'u dang mi yang de bzhin te/ /seng+ge stag dang dom dag dang / /sen mo mche ba gang mthu ldan/ /btsun pa/ ba lang gi sha 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /
btsun pa/ rta dang / wa'i sha dang / spre'u'i sha dang / mi'i sha dang / seng+ge'i sha dang / stag gi sha dang / dom gyi sha dang / gzhan yang rkang bzhi pa sen mo dang mche ba'i stobs dang ldan
pa de dag gi sha 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ gang gi sha 'tshal du mi rung ba de'i zhag dang / 'o ma 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /u pa li/ de
ci'i phyir zhe na/ u pa li/ gang gis sha mi rung ba de'i thams cad kyang mi rung ba'o/ /btsun pa/ sha rjen 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /bdag gi phyir bsad pa'i sha
'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /sman gyi dngos po rdzogs so// //'dul ba gzhung dam pa/ bam po bco brgyad pa/ mdor na/ dbyar gnyis bye bar gyur pa gnas/ /
rnyed dang dge 'dun dag gi gnyis/ /smyos pa chad pa gsum pa dang / /sbyor ba mgron po mang po dbyar/ /btsun pa/ khyim bdag cig gis dbyar tshul du zhugs pa la chos gos 'di 'bul lo/ /
zhes mchi ste/ dbyar gnas pa rnams la chos gos shig phul na/ de la dbyar gyi zla ba tha mar yang ma gyur la/ gtan pa yang ma bting na/ gang gis 'thob/ u pa li/ dbyar gnas pa
rnams kyis so/ /btsun pa/ khyim bdag cig gis chos gos 'di ni/ dbyar tshul du zhugs pa rnams la 'bul lo/ /zhes mchi ste/ dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'i dge 'dun rnams la phul
ba der dbyar gyi zla ba yang tha mar gyur la gnas der gtan pa bting na/ gang gis 'thob/ dbyar gnas pa rnams kyis so/ /btsun pa/ khyim bdag cig gis dge 'dun la gnas 'dir
dge slong gang gnas pa de dag la chos gos 'di 'bul lo/ /zhes mchi ste/ gos shig phul na/ gang gis 'thob/ gang la byin pas so/ /de bzhin du gnyis pa dang / gsum pa nas
bcu pa'i bar du rgyas par de dag la phul na/ gang gis 'thob/ gang la byin pas so/ /btsun pa/ khyim bdag cig gis dge 'dun la gos shig phul te gos 'di ni/ gnas 'dir
sang phod gnas pa'i dge slong de dag la dbul lo/ /zhes mchi na/ gang gis 'thob/ gang la byin pas so/ /de bzhin du gnyis pa dang / gsum pa nas lo bcu'i
bar du gnas pa de dag la dbul lo/ /zhes mchi na/ gang gis 'thob/ gang la byin pas so/ /'on te gnas de na da ltar mi gnas par gyur na/ dge slong de dag gis gos de dag bgo
bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bgo bar gyis shig /btsun pa/ dbyar gyi nang logs su dge 'dun dag bye na/ dbyar gyi rnyed pa de dag stsal bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun
pa| dbyar gyi gnas su ring du gnas par gyur pa las dge 'dun bye na/ dbyar gyi rnyed pa de dag stsal bar bgyi'am/ byin cig /su la/ phyogs gnyis ka la'o/ /btsun pa/ dbyar gyi
nang logs su dge slong gis lhung bzed dang / chos gos btsal te mchis na/ de'i dbyar gyi rnyed pa stsal bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ de ste dbyar gyi gnas
su yun ring du gnas par gyur na/ de'i dbyar gyi rnyed pa stsal tam/ u pa li/ byin cig /su la/ gang la bcol pa'am bsngos par gyur pa'o/ /btsun pa/ dbyar gyi nang logs
su dge slong zhig dus bgyis na/ de la dbyar gyi rnyed pa stsal bar bgyi'am/ ma sbyin cig /de ste dbyar gyi nang logs su yun ring du gnas par gyur te dus 'das na/ dbyar gyi rnyed
pa stsal tam/ u pa li/ byin cig /su la/ gang la bsngos par gyur pa la'o/ /'on te su la'ang bsngos par gyur pa ma mchis na/ su la stsal/ dge 'dun la'o/ /btsun pa/ dbyar
gyi nang logs su dge slong zhig dge tshul pha lags par khas blangs na/ de la dbyar gyi rnyed pa stsal bar bgyi'am/ sbyin par bya'o/ /de la ji tsam zhig stsal/ dge tshul pha'i skal pa'o//
de ste dbyar gyi gnas su yun ring du gnas par gyur nas dge tshul pha lags par khas blangs na/ ji tsam stsal bar bgyi/ dge slong gi skal pa'o/ /btsun pa/ dbyar gyi nang logs
su dge slong zhig khyim pa lags par khas blangs na/ de dbyar gyi rnyed pa stsal par bgyi'am/ mi sbyin no/ /de ste dbyar gyi gnas su yun ring du gnas par gyur nas khyim pa lags par
las blangs na/ de dbyar gyi rnyed pa stsal par bgyi'am/ byin cig /su la/ gang la bsngos par gyur pa la'o/ /btsun pa/ dbyar gyi nang logs su dge slong zhig ma ning lags
par khas blangs pa dang / dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang / pha dang / ma dang / dgra bcom pa bsad pa dang / dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa dang / de bzhin gshegs la ngan sems
kyis khrag phyung ba dang / mu stegs can dang / mu stegs can du song ba dang / rkun gnas dang / sngar nyes pa byung ba dang / sngar 'khrugs pa rnams lags par khas blangs na/ de
dag la dbyar gyi rnyed pa stsal par bgyi'am/ u pa li/ mi sbyin no/ /btsun pa/ de ste dbyar gyi gnas su yun ring du gnas par gyur nas rab tu shes na/
de la dbyar gyi rnyed pa stsal bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ sbyin par bya'o/ /btsun pa/ dbyar gyi nang logs su dge slong ma lags par khas blangs pa dang / mi gnas pa dang / so sor
gnas pa dang / nye bar phyogs pa dang / bslab pa stsal pa rnams lags par khas blangs na/ de dag dbyar gyi rnyed pa stsal par bgyi'am/ mi sbyin no/ /btsun pa/ de ste yang dbyar
gyi gnas su yun ring du gnas sam/ dbyar rangs par gnas pa de dag la khas blangs na/ de dag la dbyar gyi rnyed pa stsal par bgyi'am/ u pa li/ sbyin par bya'o/ /btsun pa/
dge slong gis gnas bzhi nas chos gos kyi skal pa bdag gir bgyis kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ 'di ltar yang dge slong des gnas bzhi char
mtshams gcig tu byas nas dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'o/ /btsun pa/ ji tsam gyis na/ chos gos rnyed pa zhes bgyi/ u pa li/ 'di lta ste/ 'di ni/ bdag gi chos gos so/ /snyam
nas mig gis mthong bar gyur pa'am/ lag pa'am/ phrag pa'am/ pang par bzhag par gyur pa'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gcig pus dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa bdag gir
bgyis kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ 'di ltar yang dge slong gcig pu gnas par gyur la de yang mi dag gis dge 'dun gyi phyir gos phul na'o/ /
btsun pa/ dge slong gis dge 'dun gyis rnyed pa brtags pa bdag gir bgyis kyang nongs pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ dge 'dun la bsngos par
gyur pa'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong smyon pa chos gos bged par bsko'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /sems 'khrugs pa dang / nad kyis gzir ba dang / glen pa dang / lkugs pa dang /
'on pa'ang de bzhin no/ /btsun pa/ dge slong dmus long chos gos bged par bsko bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ dge slong smyon pa'i chos gos gang nas bzung
ste bsngo bar bgyi/ nam rang gi sems sor chud pa tshun chad do/ /btsun pa/ smyon pa las chos gos blang bar bgyi'am/ mi blang bar bgyi/ kha cig las ni/ blang bar bya/ kha
cig las ni/ mi blang bar bya'o/ /gang las blang bar bya/ gang la pha'am/ ma'am/ spun nam/ sring mo gson pa'am/ rang gi khyim nas byung yang rung ste/ yongs su gtong ba'i
'du shes kyang yod pa'o/ /btsun pa/ dbyar zhig pa las dbyar gyi rnyed pa stsal par bgyi'am/ kha cig la ni/ sbyin/ kha cig la ni/ mi sbyin no/ /gang la mi sbyin zhe na/ gang la
dbyar snga ma'i tshul yang med la phyi ma'i tshul yang med par shes pa'o/ /gang la sbyin par bya zhe na/ gang la dbyar snga ma'i tshul yang yod la phyi ma'i yang yod par shes
pa'o/ /btsun pa/ nad g.yog gi sbyor ba btang bar gyur te gzhan la yang spro bar bgyis la nad pa yang dus bgyis na/ nad g.yog gang la gos stsal par bgyi/ phyi ma la'o/ /btsun pa/
nad g.yog mtshams kyi slad rol du mchis pa las nad pa dus bgyis na/ nad g.yog de la gos stsal par bgyi'am/ de ste nad pa'i don zhig la song bar gyur na/ de la nad g.yog gi
gos sbyin par bya'o/ /'on te gzhan gyi don zhig la song na ni/ mi sbyin no/ /btsun pa/ nad g.yog gnas gzhan du dbyar du zhugs par gyur na/ de la nad g.yog gi gos stsal par bgyi'am/
mi stsal bar bgyi/ sbyin par bya'o/ /btsun pa/ dge tshul phas nad g.yog bgyis na/ de la nad g.yog gi gos stsal bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ sbyin par bya'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong
mas nad g.yog bgyis pa las nad pa dus bgyis na/ de la nad g.yog gi gos stsal par bgyi'am/ mi sbyin no/ /dge slob ma dang / dge tshul ma rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /btsun
pa/ mgron po mang po bcom pa'i gos rnyed na/ blang bar bgyi'am/ mi blang bar bgyi/ u pa li/ de ste tshong pas byin na/ blang bar bya'o/ /'on te rkun pos byin na/ de'i tshe mi
blang ngo / /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dbyar gyi nang logs su dbyar gyi rnyed pa ma bgod cig /ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ khyim bdag cig gis gnas mang zhig nas
dge slong dag mgron du bos te gnas gcig tu 'tshal ma 'tshal nas dge 'dun dag la mngon sum du gos phul na/ dge slong de dag gis gos bgo bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ gos de dag
ni/ rkyen 'byung ba'i gos pas bgo bar bya'o/ /btsun pa/ dbyar gyi nang logs su dge slong zhig dus bgyis na/ dge slong de dag gis gos de dag bgo bar bgyi'am/ shi ba'i gos bas na/
bgo bar bya'o/ /mdor na/ grong gnyis spu can phyi rol mtshams/ /de bzhin du yang mchod rten no/ /mtshams las bsngos par byas pa dang / /chad pa tha mar gyur pa'o/ /btsun pa/
grong gi nang na gtsug lag khang zhig mchis la der dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'i dge 'dun rnams don zhig gi slad du mtshams kyi slad rol du mchis par gyur pa dang / de'i mtha' na 'khod
pa'i dge slong dag grong khyer gyi mtshams kyi nang na mchis pa las/ der mi dag gis dge 'dun la dbyar gyi rnyed pa zhig phul na/ gang gis 'thob/ grong khyer gyi dge 'dun gyis so/ /btsun
pa/ grong khyer du dge 'dun tshul du zhugs nas dbyar gyi nang logs su bye na/ dbyar gyi rnyed pa gang gis 'thob/ u pa li/ chos la phyogs pas so/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis spu can
las chos gos gsum du byin gyis brlabs na/ byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bgyi'am/ gos gzhan zhig yod na ni/ byin gyis ma rlobs shig /byin gyis brlabs
na ni/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis mtshams kyi slad rol du mchis nas dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa bdag nyid kyis bdag gir bgyis na/ cir 'gyur/
nyes byas so/ /btsun pa/ dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'i dge 'dun dbyar gyi nang logs su mchod rten gyi rnyed pa bgos kyang nongs par mi 'gyur zhing rung bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u
pa li/ yod de/ nyan thos kyi mchod rten la bsngos par gyur pa ni/ shi ba'i yo byad pas na/ bgo bar bya'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gum pa'i yo byad mtshams kyi nang na
'khod pas bgo bar gyis shig /ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ dge slong gis gum pa'i yo byad byin gyis brlabs te mtshams kyi slad rol du mchis na/ gum pa'i yo byad kyi skal ba
stsal tam/ u pa li/ sbyin no/ /de ste byin gyis ma brlabs par mchis na/ stsal tam/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ gum pa'i yo byad dang gos byin gyis ma brlabs
par dge slong gzhan dag cig mchis na/ de dag la gum pa'i yo byad kyi skal pa stsal par bgyi'am/ u pa li/ sbyin par bya'o/ /btsun pa/ de ste byin gyis brlabs nas mchis
na| stsal par bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gum pa'i yo byad rnams gsol ba dang las kyis byin gyis rlobs shig /ces gsungs na/ btsun
pa| gnas gang na dge slong gcig pu mchis na/ de ji ltar byin gyis brlab par bgyi/ u pa li/ dge slong des sems bskyed nas tshig tu smra bar bya ste/ bgo ba'i las rdzas 'di ni/
bdag gis 'thob pas na/ bdag gis chos gos 'di bsdu bar bgyi'o/ /bdag gir bya'o/ /'di ni/ byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /zhes byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /gnas gang na dge
slong gnyis sam gsum yang rung gnas na/ de dag kyang gcig la gcig smra bar bya'o/ /btsun pa/ gos ma dras pa la byin gyis brlab tu rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/
de dang 'dra ba'i rkyen zhig byung na/ rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /gos kyi dngos po rdzogs so// //mdor na/ rnying pa gnyis dang bzhag pa dang / /gsar pa brtan
pa zhig pa dang / /zin pa dang ni ma zin pa/ /dus su rnyed pa'ang ma bgos gnyis/ /mi rung mtshams kyi phyi rol dang / /ma bgos gang zag de bzhin bcu/ /btsun pa/ gos rnying
pa gtan par bting na/ bting ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /gos rnying pa gang zhe na/ gang gis sngar dge
'dun gyis gtan pa bting bar gyur pa'o/ /gos rnying pa bcangs pa gtan par bting na/ bting ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun
ni| 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /gos rnying par bcangs pa gang zhe na/ gang dge slong gis spyad pa'o/ /btsun pa/ nye bar bzhag pa'i gos gtan par bting na/ bting ba zhes bgyi'am/
u pa li/ bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /nye bar bzhag pa'i gos gang zhe na/ spangs pa'o/ /btsun pa/ gos gsar pa gtan par bting na/ bting ba
zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun yang 'das pa dang bcas par mi 'gyur ro/ /gos gsar pa gang zhe na/ gang dge 'dun gyis thog mar gtan par bting ba'o/ /btsun
pa| brtan pa'i gos gtan par bting na/ bting ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /brtan pa'i gos gang zhe na/ gos
gang dbyar tha ma'i zla ba la rnyed pa'o/ /btsun pa/ gos zhig pa zhig gtan par bting na/ bting ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni/ 'das pa dang bcas
pa'o/ /gos zhig pa gang zhe na/ gos rul pa'o/ /btsun pa/ gos ma lags pa zhig gtan par bting na/ bting ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun
ni| 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ gos lags pa gtan par bting na/ bting ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun yang 'das pa dang bcas par mi 'gyur
ro/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang dus su rnyed pa'i gos gtan par things shig /ces gsungs na/ dus su rnyed pa'i gos gtan par bting na/ bting ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa
li| bting ba zhes bya ste/ dus kyi gos gang zhe na/ gos gang zla ba gsum 'das nas de nyid kyi nya bri'i zhag cig la rnyed pa'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gyon pa'i gos gtan
par bting na/ bting ba zhes gsungs na/ ma gyon pa'i gos gang lags/ gsar pa btags ma thag pa'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gyon pa'i gos rung ba gtan par things
shig /ces gsungs na/ bting ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bting ba zhes bya'o/ /gos ma gyon pa rung ba gang zhe na/ kha dog can no/ /btsun pa/ mi rung ba'i gos shig gtan par bting
na| bting ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /mi rung ba'i gos gang zhe na/ rang gi rgyus mi rung ba'o/ /btsun pa/ gos gsar pa
gtan pa 'ding bar ma bskos pas gtan par bting na/ bting ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ mtshams kyi slad
rol du bskos pa'i chos gos gtan par bting ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ gtan pa
bting ba chad pas bcad pas gtan pa bting na/ bting ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ de bzhin du gtan
pa bting ba chad pa 'khor ba dang / yid mgu bar spyod pa dang / yid mgu bar spyad pa lags pa dang / bslab pa stsal pa dang / dbyar ma mchis pa dang / zhig pa dang / dbyar phyi mar
tshul du zhugs pa dang / dbyar gzhan du gnas pa dang / smyon pa rnams kyis gtan pa bting na/ bting ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni/ 'das pa dang
bcas pa'o/ /mdor na/ lnga pa gnyis dang sems gnyis dang / /shol bor gnyis kyang de bzhin te/ /bud med mtshan dang brtan pa dang / /gnas la rnam pa drug tu bya/ /btsun
pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang zag lnga gtan pa 'ding bar mi bsko ste/ de ni/ chad pa bgyi pa dang / chad pa 'khor ba dang / yid mgu bar spyod pa dang / yid mgu bar spyod
pa lags pa dang / bslab pa stsal pa rnams so/ /zhes gsungs na/ btsun pa/ chad pa bgyid pa'i gang zag cig gis gtan pa bting na/ bting ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/
bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ de bzhin du chad pa 'khor ba dang / yid mgu bar spyod pa dang / yid mgu bar spyad pa lags pa dang / bslab pa
