stsal pa rnams kyis gtan pa bting na/ bting ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /gzhan yang gang zag lnga gtan pa 'ding bar
mi bsko ste/ dbyar med pa dang / dbyar zhig pa dang / dbyar phyi mar tshul du zhugs pa dang / dbyar gzhan du gnas pa dang / spangs pa rnams so/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
gzhan yang gang zag lnga ste/ dbyar med pa dang / dbyar zhig pa dang / dbyar phyi mar tshul du zhugs pa dang / dbyar gzhan du gnas pa dang / spangs pa rnams kyis gtan pa bting na/
bting bar bya'o/ /zhes gsungs na/ btsun pa/ de ste dbyar ma mchis pas gtan pa bting na/ gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ kha cig ni/ bting ba zhes bya'o/ /kha cig ni/ ma
bting ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ gang gis bting ba lags/ gang gis ma bting ba lags/ u pa li/ 'di ltar dge tshul pha dbyar tshul du zhugs pa la dbyar phyi ma'i gnas su bsnyen
par rdzogs te zla ba gsum 'das pas gtan pa bting na/ de la gtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ u pa li/ zla ba gsum 'das nas gtan pa zhes bya ste/ de yang zla ba
gsum du mngon no/ /u pa li/ gang phyi mar zhugs pa las rab tu byung ste bsnyen par rdzogs la de yang zla ba gsum du gnas pa'i dge slong dang lhan cig gtan pa
bting na/ de ni/ gtan pa ma bting ba zhes bya'o/ /u pa li/ zla ba gsum lon nas gtan pa bting ba zhes bya ste/ de zla ba gsum ma lon par mngon no/ /btsun pa/ dbyar zhig pa zhig
gis gtan pa bting na/ gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ kha cig ni/ bting ba zhes bya'o/ /kha cig ni/ ma bting ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ gang gis bting ba zhes bgyi/ gang gis
ma bting ba zhes bgyi/ u pa li/ gang gis dbyar snga mar yang shes pa med la/ dbyar phyi ma'i tshul yang med pa ste/ de zla ba gsum du dge slong dang lhan cig gnas pa dang gcig car
gtan pa bting na/ de'i gtan pa ma bting ba zhes bya'o/ /u pa li/ zla ba gsum gnas nas gtan pa zhes bya ste/ de la ni/ zla ba gsum du shes pa'ang med do/ /u pa li/ gang dbyar snga
mar gnas pa'am/ phyi mar yang shes la/ des zhag bdun nam bzhi bcur byin gyis brlabs nas mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas skya rengs shar ba de yang zla ba gsum du gnas pa'i
gtan pa bting na/ de'i gtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o/ /u pa li/ zla ba gsum du gnas nas gtan pa zhes bya ste/ de la yang zla ba gsum du mngon no/ /yid ma las 'gal bas
nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa/ dbyar phyi mar tshul du zhugs pa zhig gtan pa bting na/ bting ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ kha cig ni/ gtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o/ /kha cig ni/ ma bting ba zhes
bya'o| |btsun pa/ gang gis gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi/ u pa li/ gang dbyar snga mar tshul du zhugs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gtan pa 'ding ba'i dge slong dang / dbyar phyi mar tshul du zhugs
pa de dag lhan cig tu gtan pa bting na/ de'i gtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o/ /u pa li/ zla ba gsum du gnas nas gtan pa zhes bya ste/ de ni/ zla ba gsum du shes pa'ang med do/ /u pa li/ dge 'dun
thams cad dbyar phyi mar tshul du zhugs la zla ba gsum du gnas nas gtan pa bting na/ de dag ni/ gtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o/ /u pa li/ zla ba gsum du gnas nas gtan pa zhes bya ste/
de dag ni/ zla ba gsum du mngon no/ /btsun pa/ dbyar gzhan du gnas pa zhig gis gtan pa bting na/ gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ kha cig ni/ gtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o//
kha cig ni/ ma bting ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ gang gis gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi/ gang gis gtan pa ma bting ba zhes bgyi/ u pa li/ dge slong dag mtshams so sor bcad pa'i gnas na
dbyar gzhan du gnas la/ gzhan du song ste gtan pa bting na/ de'i gtan pa ma bting ba zhes bya'o/ /u pa li/ gtan pa gang zhe na/ zla ba gsum du gnas nas gtan pa bting ba de la ni/ zla ba
gsum du shes pa yang med do/ /u pa li/ gang zla ba gsum du gnas pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dbyar zla ba gsum 'das pa dang / de nyid kyi nya bri'i zhag cig la
mtshams chen po bkrol te gnas bzhi'am/ lnga'i mtshams gcig tu byas nas gtan pa bting na/ gnas de dag thams cad du gtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du gnas la gnas
gzhan du gtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ spangs pas gtan pa bting na/ gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ kha cig ni/ bting ba zhes bya'o/ /kha cig ni/ ma bting ba zhes
bya'o| |btsun pa/ gang gis gtan pa ma bting ba zhes bgyi/ u pa li/ dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'i dge slong gang la dge 'dun 'dus pa rnams kyis spangs pa'i las byas pa de dag kyang bzod pa
ma gsol bar dbyar gnas pa dag kyang lhan cig gtan pa bting na/ de'i gtan pa ni/ ma bting ba zhes bya'o/ /gang gi bting ba zhes bgyi/ u pa li/ dge slong gang dbyar tshul du zhugs pa la
dge 'dun 'dus pa rnams kyis mnyam du mi spyod pa'i sdom pa bcas par gyur tam/ dkar pa'i las byas par gyur la/ des kyang bzod pa gsol na/ dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun rnams
dang lhan cig tu gtan pa bting na/ de'i gtan ba bting ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gtan pa 'ding bas gtan pa blangs nas bkru ba dang / brkyang ba dang /
dra ba dang / btsem pa thams cad dang / khab so tha ma'i bar du thog mar 'gro bar byos la/ bdag gis chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi gtan pa 'ding bar bya ba 'ding ngo / /bdag gis gding ngo / /
zhes sems rnam pa gsum skyed cig /sems rnam pa gsum bskyed kyang chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi gtan pa 'ding bar bya/ bdag gis gding ngo / /zhes sems rnam pa gnyis bskyed na/
gtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ sems bskyed pa gcig gis gtan pa 'ding du rung ngam/ u pa li/ rung ste/ 'di ltar yang gtan pa 'ding ba'i dge slong gis gtan pa gding bar
bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi gtan pa gding ngo / /zhes sems bskyed na/ gtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ tshul nas 'byung ba'i tshe rgyal pos shol bor na dge
slong de dag gis gtan pa ji ltar gding bar bgyi/ ji ltar tshul nas byung ba bzhin no/ /btsun pa/ gtan pa de nyid rung la de nyid mi rung bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ 'di ltar
yang dge slong de dag kha cig ni/ shol bor/ kha cig shol ma bor bar tshul du zhugs te de nyid du khyim bdag gis shol ma bor ba'i gnas su tshul nas 'byung ba de nyid kyi nya bri'i zhag cig la dge
'dun gnyi ga la zan byin te gtan pa'i gos phul na/ gos de shol ma bor ba la ni/ rung ngo / shol bor ba la ni/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ gang ma lta bu'i tshig brgyad po 'di dag gis ni/ gtan pa
las 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de la thun mong ba ni/ du/ thun mong ma lags pa ni/ du/ u pa li/ thog ma dang tha ma ma gtogs par lhag ma rnams ni/ thun mong pa'o/ /
btsun pa/ gtan pa 'ding ba'i dge slong gis gtan pa 'ding ba'i tshe mtshan gyur na/ gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bting ba zhes bya ste/ gtan pa sbed pa'i dge slong dad par
byos shig /btsun pa/ gtan pa zhes kyang bgyi/ gtan pa 'ding ba zhes kyang bgyi/ gtan pa 'byin pa zhes kyang bgyi na/ btsun pa/ gtan pa ni/ gang / gtan pa 'ding ba ni/ gang / gtan
pa 'byin pa ni/ gang lags/ u pa li/ gos ni/ gtan pa'o/ /sems bskyed pa ni/ gtan pa 'ding ba'o/ /ma lta bu'i tshig brgyad po ni/ gtan pa 'byin pa'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong rnams
kyis gnas bzhi'am/ lnga mtshams kyi nang du bgyis nas dbyar tshul du zhugs te de dag tshul nas byung ste gtan pa bting na/ gnas de dag thams cad du gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi'am/
u pa li/ thams cad du gtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ de ste gtan pa bting nas mtshams chen po bkrol te so sor mtshams bkum na/ gtan pa phyung ba zhes bgyi'am/
u pa li/ ma yin no/ /gnas de dag thams cad gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ gtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o/ /de ste so sor mtshams bcad nas gtan pa phyung na/
gnas de dag thams cad du gtan pa phyung ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin te/ gang dag 'byin pa de dag ni/ gtan pa phyung ba zhes bya'o/ /gang dag mi 'byin pa de dag ni/ gtan pa ma phyung
ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ tshul nas byung ba dang / dge slong rnams kyis gnas bzhi'am/ lnga mtshams gcig tu byas nas gtan pa bting na/ gnas de dag thams cad du gtan pa bting ba
zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ thams cad du gtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ de ste gtan pa bting nas mtshams chen po bkrol te so sor mtshams bkum na/ gtan pa ma bting
ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin te/ de dag thams cad du gtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ de ste so sor mtshams bkum nas gtan pa phyung na/ gnas de dag thams cad du
gtan pa phyung ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin te/ gang 'byin pa de dag ni/ gtan pa phyung ba zhes bya'o/ /gang mi 'byin pa de dag ni/ gtan pa ma phyung ba zhes bya'o/ /mdor na/ zla ba
gsum dang lnga pa dang / /gso sbyong gi ni mtha' lnga gsum/ /sbyar ma dang ni ras chen rkyen/ /'byin pa gnyis dang bye ba gnyis/ /tshad gnyis pa yang de bzhin te/ /khyim pa dag la sogs pa
dang / /bslab pa byin pa tha ma 'o/ /btsun pa/ ji srid cig tu gtan pa gding bar bgyi/ u pa li/ zla ba gsum ste/ ji ltar zla ba gsum du gnas par tshul du zhugs pa'o/ /btsun pa/ ji
srid cig tu gtan pa bcang bar bgyi/ zla ba lnga'o/ /btsun pa/ gang dbyar phyi ma'i mthar gtan pa bting ba na/ de dag kyang zla ba lngar gtan pa bting bar 'gyur ram/
u pa li/ gang gis gtan pa ji ltar bting bar gyur pa de dag gi grangs bzhin zla ba lngar bcang bar bya'o/ /btsun pa/ gso sbyong gi mthar gtan pa 'ding bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ gso
sbyong gi mthar bya'o/ /btsun pa/ gso sbyong gi mthar dbyung bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ gso sbyong gi mthar bya'o/ /btsun pa/ dbyar ma rung bar gzhag pa la rgyu du/ rkyen du/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyu lnga dang / rkyen lnga'o/ /lnga po de dag gang zhe na/ dge slong dang bcas/ sgo glegs dang bcas pa'i gnas su gyur pa dang / 'jigs pa dang bcas/ dogs
pa dang bcas pa'i yul dang / char 'bab pa'am/ char 'bab par dogs par gyur pa dang / dus ma yin par grong gzhan du 'gro bar 'dod par gyur pa dang / gnas na gtan pa bting
bar gyur pa dang / gsol ba dang las ni/ tha ma'o/ /btsun pa/ dbyar gyi gos ras chen rung bar gzhag pa la rgyu du/ rkyen du u pa li/ gsum ste/ char pa mi 'bab cing char pa
'bab par mi dogs par gyur pa dang / dus ma yin par grong gzhan nam/ grong khyer gzhan nam/ klung rgal 'dod par gyur pa dang / klung gi drung ngam khron pa'i drung na mi gnas pa'o/ /
btsun pa/ dbyar gyi gos ras chen ji srid du bcang bar bgyi/ zla ba phyed dang lnga'o/ /btsun pa/ gtan pa 'ding ba'i gnas su rkyen med par 'gyur ba du/ u pa li/ bcu ste/ zhag gcig gis
'bral ba med pa dang / zhag bcu las 'da' ba med pa dang / zla ba gcig las 'da' ba med pa dang / gos ma bsngos pa rnams bcang ba dang / chos gos stod g.yogs dang mthang gos gnyis

pus ljongs spyod du 'gro ba dang / mang po za ba med pa dang / yang yang za ba med pa dang / spyan ma drangs par 'gro ba dang / gos rnams ci bder tshol ba dang / ston zla tha chung nas dpyad zla ra ba'i
bar du ste/ gang gi rnyed pa thob pa de dag ni/ dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyis bgo bar bya'o/ /btsun pa/ ci bslab pa'i gnas sam/ chos gos byin gyis brlabs pa de dag ma mchis par
'gyur ram/ u pa li/ ma yin te/ 'di dag ni/ yon tan no/ /btsun pa/ gsol ba dang / las ma byas pas sngar gtan pa dbyung bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ 'di ltar
yang dge slong gzhi pa de dag gis de nyid kyi nya bri'i zhag cig la gtan pa bting bar gyur pa dang / dge slong glo bur pa mang zhig lhags nas de dag ni/ de'i nyin mo bco lngar gyur te gso sbyong
byed/ so sor thar pa klog pa dang / de ste dge slong gzhi pa rnams kyang de dag gi rjes su zhugs nas gso sbyong byas na/ gsol ba dang las ma byas par gtan pa phyung ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/
dge slong gzhi pa rnams kyis gtan pa bting ste mtshams kyi slad rol du mchis pa dang / glo bur du dge slong rnams lhags te gtan pa phyung na/ phyung ba zhes bgyi'am/
u pa li/ ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ u pa li/ gang gis gtan pa bting ba de nyid kyis gtan pa phyung ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ dbyar tshul du zhugs pa las dge 'dun bye na/ gang gis
gtan pa gding / chos bzhin du smra ba rnams kyis so/ /btsun pa/ gtan pa bting ba'i gnas su dge 'dun bye na/ dbyar gyi rnyed pa sus 'thob/ phyogs gnyis kas so/ /btsun pa/ de ste mngon
du gyur pa las rnyed na/ sus 'thob/ chos kyi phyogs kyis so/ /btsun pa/ tshad las chung ba'i chos gos dum bur sbyar te gos su btsem zhing gtan par bting na/ gtan par bting ba zhes
bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma bting ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ tshad las chung ba zhig gtan par bting na/ gtan par bting ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma bting ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/
gos ji lta bus gtan pa gding bar bgyi/ u pa li/ mchur lnga/ zheng du gsum pas so/ /btsun pa/ gtan pa bting ba khyim pa zhig gis gtan pa bting na/ gtan pa bting ba zhes
bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun yang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /de bzhin du gtan pa 'ding ba ma ning dang / mi gnas pa dang / so sor gnas pa nas sngar
'khrugs pa'i bar du de dag gis gtan pa bting na/ gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun yang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ gtan pa
bting ba za ma zhig gis gtan pa bting na/ bting ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun yang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ gtan pa 'ding ba dge 'dun
gyi dbyen bgyis pa dang / nye bar phyogs pa dang / bslab pa stsal pa rnams kyis gtan pa bting na/ bting ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni/ 'das pa dang
bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ gtan pa 'ding ba smyon ba zhig gis gtan pa bting na/ gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma bting ba zhes bya'o/ /de ste dge slong gi 'du shes yod
la| bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dge 'dun gyi gtan pa gding ngo / /bdag gis bting ngo / /zhes sems bskyed na/ gtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du sems 'khrugs pa dang /
nad kyis gzir ba rnams su shes par bya'o/ /btsun pa/ gtan pa 'ding ba glen pa dang / lkugs pa dang / 'on pa rnams kyis gtan pa bting na/ bting ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/
bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ gtan pa 'ding ba gzhan du gnas pas gtan pa bting na/ bting ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bting ba zhes
bya ste/ dge 'dun ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /gtan pa'i dngos po rdzogs so// //mdor na/ gang du gang gis mtshams bzhi dang / /bsgo ba gos dang
gso sbyong bzhi/ /gtan bzhi bye ba gang zag go /btsun pa/ yul ko'u sham+b+hi'i dge 'dun gang gi tshe bye bar gyur/ nam mtshams kyi nang na gcig pu gnas pa las gso sbyong byed pa dang / dge
'dun gyi bya ba dang / dge 'dun gyi don rnams tha dad par byas pa na'o/ /btsun pa/ yul ko'u sham+b+hir dang po dge 'dun gang gis phye/ chos ma yin par smras pas/ de dag gis thog mar
mtshams kyi nang du gso sbyong dang / dge 'dun gyi bya ba dang dge 'dun gyi don rnams tha dad par byas pas so/ /btsun pa/ yul ko'u sham+b+hi pas mtshams bshig na/ mtshams zhig pa zhes
bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ de ste yul yangs pa can na gnas pas mtshams bshig na/ mtshams zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ dge slong
ma'i dge 'dun bye nas phyogs dang / gzhan gyi phyogs su gnas pa la zla ba phyed phyed cing lung dbog pa dang bstan par bgyi'am/ btsun pa/ 'di skad du/ sring mo rnams je mthun par gyis
shig /ces sgos shig /btsun pa/ dge slong ma'i dge 'dun bye nas phyogs su gnas pa'i dge slong ma dag gis zla ba phyed phyed cing lung 'bog cing bstan pa btsal bar bgyi'am/ btsal
bar bya'o/ /su las btsal/ chos phyogs pa las so/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun bye nas phyogs gnyis su gnas pa dag gis dge slong ma dag la lung 'bog cing bstan pa stsal bar bgyi'am/
dge slong ma'i dge 'dun mi bye bar bya ba'i phyir byin cig /btsun pa/ yul ko'u sham+b+hir phyogs gnyis ka 'dus shing 'khod par byed na/ gzu bos gang du dge slong ma la lung dbog par bgyi/
mtshams kyi phyi rol song ba'o/ /btsun pa/ yul ko'u sham+b+hir phyogs gnyis ka 'dus shing 'khod par gyur la/ dge slong gzu bo dag kyang mtshams kyi slad rol tu mchis par gyur ba dang / khyim
bdag cig mchis nas dge 'dun la gos shig phul na/ gang gis 'thob/ phyogs gnyis kas so/ /yul ko'u sham+b+hi na gnas pas yul yangs pa can na gnas pa dag dang lhan cig tu gso sbyong
bgyid na/ gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /yul yangs pa can na gnas pas yul ko'u sham+b+hi pa dag dang lhan cig tu gso sbyong bgyid na/ gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes
bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /gzu bo rnams yul ko'u sham+b+hi na gnas pa dag dang lhan cig tu gso sbyong bgyid na/ gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /gzu
bo dag yul yangs pa can na gnas pa dang lhan cig tu gso sbyong bgyid na/ gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /de ste byed na/ gzu bo'i dngos po med do/ /btsun
pa| gtan pa bting ba'i gnas su dge 'dun bye na/ gtan pa gang gis gding bar bgyi/ chos su smra ba dag gis so/ /btsun pa/ gtan pa bting ba'i gnas su
dge 'dun bye na/ gtan pa gang gis dbyung bar bgyi/ chos su smra ba rnams kyis so/ /btsun pa/ gang nye bar phyogs pa de thams cad so sor gnas pa lags sam/ nye bar phyogs pa
gnas pa ma yin pa'ang yod/ so sor gnas la nye bar phyogs pa yang yod/ nye bar phyogs la so sor gnas pa'ang yod/ nye bar yang ma phyogs la so sor gnas pa ma yin pa'ang yod
do| |nye bar phyogs la so sor gnas pa ma yin pa ni/ gang dngos po lnga la nye bar phyogs par gyur pa ste/ ma mthong ba'i phyir dge 'dun gyis spangs par ma gyur pa dang / slar las
ma byas pa'i phyir spangs par ma gyur pa dang / sdig pa la lta ba ma btang ba'i phyir spangs par ma gyur pa'o/ /so sor gnas la nye bar ma phyogs pa ni/ 'di ltar dge slong de ma mthong ba'i phyir
dge 'dun gyis spangs par gyur pa dang / slar las ma byas pa'i phyir dang / sdig par lta ba ma btang ba'i phyir spangs par gyur pa dang / dngos po lnga la yang nye bar phyogs par ma gyur
pa'o/ /nye bar yang phyogs la so sor yang gnas pa ni/ de 'di ltar dge slong de dngos po lnga la nye bar phyogs par yang gyur la/ ma mthong ba'i phyir dge 'dun gyis kyang spangs par
gyur pa dang / slar las ma byas pa'i phyir dang / sdig pa la lta ba ma btang ba'i phyir spangs par gyur pa'o/ /nye bar phyogs pa'ang ma yin la so sor gnas pa'ang ma yin pa ni/ rnam pa de lta bu dag
ma gtogs pa'o/ /gang nye bar phyogs pa de na/ cang mi gnas pa lags sam/ nye bar phyogs pa mi gnas pa ma yin pa yang yod/ mi gnas la nye bar phyogs pa yang yod/ nye bar yang phyogs
la mi gnas pa yang yod/ nye bar yang ma phyogs la mi gnas pa ma yin pa yang yod do/ /nye bar phyogs la mi gnas pa ma yin pa ni/ 'di ltar dge slong de dngos po lnga la nye bar phyogs
par gyur la phas pham pa bzhi'i nyes pa gang yang rung ba byung bar ma gyur pa'o/ /mi gnas la nye bar yang ma phyogs pa ni/ de 'di ltar dge slong de phas pham pa bzhi las gang yang rung ba'i
nyes pa byung bar gyur la/ dngos po lnga la ni/ nye bar ma phyogs pa yin no/ /nye bar yang phyogs la mi gnas pa yang yin pa ni/ 'di ltar dge slong de dngos po lnga la nye bar phyogs par gyur
cing / phas pham pa bzhi las gang yang rung ba'i nyes pa byung ba yin no/ /nye bar phyogs pa yang ma yin la mi gnas pa yang ma yin pa ni/ rnam pa de lta bu ma gtogs pa'o/ /gang so
sor gnas pa de thams cad mi gnas pa lags sam/ so sor gnas pa la mi gnas pa ma yin pa'ang yod/ mi gnas la so sor gnas pa ma yin pa yang yod/ so sor yang
gnas la mi gnas pa yang yod/ gnas la so sor yang mi gnas pa yang yod do/ /so sor gnas la mi gnas pa ma yin pa ni/ 'di ltar dge slong de ma
mthong ba'i phyir spangs par gyur cing / /slar las ma byas pa dang / sdig pa la lta ba ma btang ba'i phyir spangs par gyur la/ phas pham pa bzhi las nyes pa gang yang rung ba ma byung ba
yin no/ /mi gnas la so sor gnas pa ma yin pa ni/ gang 'di ltar dge slong des phas pham pa bzhi'i nyes pa gang yang rung ba byung bar gyur gyi/ ma mthong ba'i phyir dge 'dun gyis
spangs pa ma byas par gyur cing / slar las ma byas pa dang / sdig pa la lta ba ma btang ba'i phyir spangs par ma gyur ba'o/ /mi gnas la so sor yang gnas pa ni/ de 'di ltar dge
slong de ma mthong ba'i phyir spangs pa yang yin la/ phas pham pa bzhi'i nyes pa gang yang rung ba byung bar gyur ba'o/ /mi gnas pa'ang ma yin la so sor gnas pa'ang ma yin pa ni/ rnam
pa de lta bu ma gtogs pa'o/ btsun pa/ dge slong nyid kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun 'byed kyi/ dge slong mas ma lags/ dge slob mas ma lags/ dge tshul mas ma lags/ dge
tshul pas ma lags sam/ u pa li/ dge slong nyid kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun 'byed kyi/ dge slong mas ma yin/ dge slob mas ma yin/ dge tshul mas ma yin/ dge
tshul phas ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang dge slong rnams ni/ dge 'dun dbye ba'i phyir rtsol lo/ /btsun pa/ dge slong ma nyid kyis dge slong ma'i dge 'dun 'byed kyi/ dge slong gis ma lags/
dge slob mas ma lags/ dge tshul mas ma lags/ dge tshul phas ma lags sam/ u pa li/ dge slong ma nyid kyis dge slong ma'i dge 'dun 'byed kyi/ dge slong phas ma yin/
dge slob mas ma yin/ dge tshul mas ma yin/ dge tshul phas ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang dge slong rnams ni/ dge 'dun dbye ba'i phyir rtsol lo/ /btsun pa/ dbye ba ni/ gang kha na ma
tho dang ldan pa ni/ gang lags/ dbye ba ni/ dge 'dun no/ /kha na ma tho ba dang ldan pa ni/ 'byed pa'o/ /btsun pa/ dge 'dun phye na/ cir 'gyur/ sbom po ste/ gsol pa dang / las ma
mnyan na/ dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'o/ /btsun pa/ ji tsam gyis na/ dge 'dun phye ba zhes bgyi/ u pa li/ gang gi tshe ji snyed pa'i dge slong rnams mtshams su byi na/ bya ba la bab
par gyur/ de dag thams cad 'dus shing mngon sum du gyur/ dad pa blang ba'i rigs pa las dad pa blangs par gyur/ dge slong rnams kyis kyang mtshams kyi nang la mtshams kyi nang yin
par 'du shes te gso sbyong dang las tha dad du byed pa de ltar na/ dge 'dun bye ba zhes bya'o/ /dge 'dun phye bas nongs pa gang bshags par bgyi/ nye pa sbom po'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis de lta bu'i gang zag la gleng bar ma bya zhig /dran par ma bya zhig /ces gsungs na/ de lta bu'i gang zag gang lags/ gang zag gang mdo sde 'dzin pa/
ma lta bu 'dzin pa/ bsod nams chen po/ 'khor g.yogs mang po/ grags pa de'o/ /de lta bu'i gang zag cig spangs na/ cir 'gyur/ nyes pa sbom bor 'gyur ro/ /yul ko'u sham+b+hi'i dngos
po rdzogs so// //'dul ba gzhung dam pa/ bam po bcu dgu pa/ mdor na/ skad dang nam mkha' mtshams dang sa/ /chos gnyis dang ni ma 'dus pa/ /chad pa 'khor dang gcig nas gcig/
ma 'dus gang zag gnas de bzhin/ btsun pa/ 'phags pa zhig gis 'phags pa'i skad du las bgyis pa dang / dge slong de dag gis kyang 'phags pa'i skad ma 'tshal na/ las
bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ las byas pa zhes bya ste/ las byed pa'i dge slong ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ 'phags pa zhig gis mtha' 'khob pa'i skad du
las bgyis pa dang / dge slong de dag gis mtha' 'khob pa'i skad ma 'tshal na/ las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ las byas pa zhes bya ste/ las byed pa ni/ 'das pa dang /
bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ mtha' 'khob pa zhig gis mtha' 'khob pa'i skad du las bgyis pa dang / dge slong de dag gis kyang mtha' 'khob pa'i skad ma 'tshal na/ las bgyis
pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ las byas pa zhes bya ste/ las byed pa ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ mtha' 'khob pa zhig gis 'phags pa'i skad du las bgyis pa dang / dge slong
de dag gis 'phags pa'i skad ma 'tshal na/ las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ las byas pa zhes bya ste/ las byed pa ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ sa la gnas
pas nam mkha' la gnas pa'i grangs su bskangs na/ las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ nam mkha' la gnas pas sa la gnas pa'i grangs su bskangs na/
las bgyis rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ las bgyid pa sa la gnas pas nam mkha' la gnas pa rnams kyi las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / btsun pa/
las bgyid pa nam mkha' la gnas pas sa la gnas pa rnams kyi las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /de bzhin du mtshams kyi nang na gnas pa dang / mtshams kyi phyi rol na
gnas pa rnams dang lhan cig bzhir bya'o/ /btsun pa/ sa la gnas pas sa la gnas pa rnams dang lhan cig las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ rung ste/ 'di ltar yang des sa la
gnas pas grangs bskangs shing sa la gnas pa rnams las dad pa blangs par gyur pa'o/ /ji ltar sa la gnas pas sa la gnas pa dang lhan cig pa de bzhin du sa la gnas pa dang rtsig
pa la gnas par ro/ /sal gnas pa dang shing la gnas par ro/ /rtsig pa la gnas pa dang rtsig pa la gnas par ro/ /rtsig pa la gnas pa dang sa la gnas par
ro| |rtsig pa la gnas pa dang shing la gnas par ro/ /shing la gnas pa dang shing la gnas par ro/ /shing la gnas pa dang sa la gnas par ro/ /shing la gnas pa dang rtsig pa la gnas
pa lhan cig tu las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ rung ste/ ji ltar yang shing la gnas pa rnams kyis grangs su bskangs te sa la gnas pa rnams las dad pa blangs par gyur pa'o/ /
las rnam pa bzhi ste/ chos bzhin ma yin par byed cing ma 'dus pa dang / chos bzhin ma yin par 'dus pa dang / chos bzhin du ma 'dus pa dang / chos bzhin du 'dus pa'o/ /chos
bzhin ma yin par ma 'dus pa gang zhe na/ gsol ba byas nas las ma bsgrags te ma 'dus par yang gyur pa'o/ /chos bzhin ma yin par 'dus pa gang zhe na/ gsol ba byas nas
las ma bsgrags par 'dus par yang gyur pa'o/ /chos bzhin du ma 'dus pa gang zhe na/ gsol ba byas la las bsgrags pa dang / ma 'dus par yang gyur pa'o/ /chos bzhin du 'dus
pa gang zhe na/ gsol ba byas shing las bsgrags la 'dus par yang gyur pa'o/ /gzhan yang / las rnam pa bzhi ste/ chos bzhin ma yin par mthun la ma 'dus pa dang / chos bzhin
ma yin par mthun la 'dus pa dang / chos bzhin du mthun la ma 'dus pa dang / chos bzhin du mthun la 'dus pa'o/ /chos bzhin ma yin par mthun la ma 'dus pa gang zhe na/ sngar
las bsgrags la phyis gsol ba byed cing ma 'dus par yang gyur pa'o/ /chos bzhin ma yin par mthun zhing 'dus pa gang zhe na/ sngar bsgrags la phyis gsol ba byed cing
'dus par yang gyur pa'o/ /chos bzhin du mthun la ma 'dus pa gang zhe na/ las de nyid kyis gsol ba byas te las gzhan bsgrags la ma 'dus par yang gyur pa'o/ /chos
bzhin du mthun la 'dus pa gang zhe na/ las de nyid kyis gsol ba byas shing las gzhan bsgrags la 'dus par yang gyur pa'o/ /btsun pa/ ma 'dus pa'i las zhes kyang bgyi/
'dus pa'i las zhes kyang bgyi na/ btsun pa/ ma 'dus pa'i las gang lags/ u pa li/ dge slong ji snyed pa rnams kyis mtshams su yang phyin/ las la yang bab par gyur/ thams
cad mngon sum du 'dus par gyur/ dad pa blang ba'i rigs pa yang dad pa blangs par gyur na/ dge slong rnams ni/ zlog cing 'khyal te/ de dag slar zlog cing 'khyal bzhin
du las byas na/ de ni/ ma 'dus pa'i las zhes bya'o/ /'dus pa'i las gang zhe na/ dge slong ji snyed pa rnams mtshams su phyin cing las la bab par gyur/ thams cad kyang
mngon sum du 'dus par gyur/ dad pa blang ba'i rigs pa yang dad pa blangs par gyur/ dge slong dag slar mi zlog cing 'khyal bar mi byed de/ de dag
slar mi zlog cing mi 'khyal bzhin du las byed pas na/ de ni/ 'dus pa'i las zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dus te 'khod nas las bgyis kyang las de ma
'dus pa'i las su 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ de ni/ 'di ltar gsol ba dang / las byed pa na/ dge slong dag slar zlog cing 'khyal te dge slong slar zlog cing
'khyal bzhin las byed pa'o/ /btsun pa/ las bgyid pa chad pa 'khor ba zhig gis las bgyis na/ las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ byas pa zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun
rnams ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ chad pa 'khor ba zhig gis dad pa blangs nas las bgyis na/ las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ byas pa zhes bya ste/ dge
slong de dag ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ dad pa gcig nas gcig tu blangs te las bgyis na/ las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ byas pa zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun
rnams ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ ma 'dus par las bgyis na/ las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma byas zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun yang 'das pa dang bcas
pa'o| |btsun pa/ gcig gis gcig la/ gcig gis gnyis la/ gcig gis gsum la/ gcig gis mang po la las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ gnyis kyis
gcig la/ gnyis kyis gnyis la/ gnyis kyis gsum la/ gnyis kyis mang po la las rnams bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ gsum gyis gcig la/ gsum gyis
gnyis la/ gsum gyis gsum la/ gsum gyis mang po la las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ mang pos mang po la las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung
ngo / /btsun pa/ las bgyid pa gnas gcig tu mchis la gnas bzhir las thams cad bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ rung ste/ de 'di ltar las byed pa'i dge slong des gnas
bzhi char gyi mtshams shing ngam/ 'dam bu'am/ re ldes mnan te las byed pa'o/ /btsun pa/ las bgyid pas mtshams gcig par gsol ba gcig dang / las gcig gis
gang zag bzhi la las bgyis na/ las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mtshams gcig par mang pos mang po la las byar mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/
dge slong gis mtshams gcig la mtshungs par gnas pa'i dge slong rnams la las bgyis kyang nongs par yang mi 'gyur la/ dge 'dun ma 'dus par yang mi 'gyur ba mchis
sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ dad pa byin pas so/ /btsun pa/ las bgyid pa'i dge slong gnas gcig na mchis pas gang zag bzhi la las bgyis na/ las de yang
bgyis par 'gyur la/ dge slong de dag kyang 'das pa dang bcas par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ 'di ltar las byed pa'i dge slong de mtshams mnan/ mtshams
bzung nas mtshams su 'greng ngam/ 'dug nas mtshams kyi nang du gnyis 'dug /mtshams kyi phyi rol tu gnyis 'dug pa la las byed pa'o/ /mdor na/ mngon sum gyur dang snga ma
dag /las rnam gsum dang shi ba dang / /mi spyad dang ni bde ba mtshams/ /nyes pa las kyang de bzhin no/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon sum du gyur pa la las
rnams gyis shig /ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ dge 'dun gyis mngon sum du ma gyur par las rnams bgyis kyang las rnams bgyis par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa
li/ yod de/ 'di ltar yang dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyis phyag mi bya ba'i sdom pa dang / longs spyod dang bral ba'i sdom pa byin pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis dge slong la
smyon pa'i sdom pa byin par gyur pa'o/ /btsun pa/ sngar las bsgrags te phyis gsol ba bgyid na/ bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ byas pa zhes bya ste/ dge slong de dag ni/
'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ bdag nyid kyis bdag spangs na/ spangs pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ spangs pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ bdag nyid kyis spangs te bdag nyid kyis bdag
nyid la bzod par bgyid na/ bzod pa bgyid pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bzod pa byas pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ bsdigs pa'i las bgyis pa la bsdigs pa'i las bgyis pa zhes
bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /de bzhin du smad pa'i las bgyis pa la smad pa'i las bgyis pa dang / bskrad pa'i las bgyis pa dang / slar sdum pa'i las bgyis pa dang / ma mthong
ba'i phyir spangs pa'i las bgyis pa dang / slar gyi las ma bgyis pa dang / sdig pa la lta ba slar ma btang ba'i phyir spang ba'i las bgyis pa dang / chad pas bcad pa la chad pa'i dang /
yid mgu ba'i spyod pa la yid mgu ba'i dang / dbyung ba'i phyir las bgyis pa la dbyung ba'i phyir las bgyis na/ las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/
bsdigs pa'i las bgyis pa la smad pa'i las bgyid/ bskrad pa dang / slar sdum pa'i dang / ma mthong ba'i phyir spangs pa dang / slar gyi las ma bgyis pa dang / sdig pa la lta ba
slar ma btang ba'i phyir spang ba'i las dang / chad pas bcad pa'i dang / yid mgu ba'i dang / dbyung ba'i las bgyid na/ las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ byas pa zhes
bya'o/ /de bzhin du las thams cad kyang 'khor lo'i rgyud bzhin du bya'o/ /btsun pa/ bsdigs pa'i las su 'os pa zhig la smad pa dang / bskrad pa dang / slar
sdum pa'i las rnams bgyis na/ las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ byas pa zhes bya ste/ sma dbab pa'i las so/ /btsun pa/ bsdigs pa'i las su 'os pa zhig la ma mthong
pa'i slad du spangs pa dang / slar ma bgyis pa dang / sdig pa la lta ba slar ma btang ba'i slad du spangs pa'i las bgyis na/ las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma byas pa
zhes bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ u pa li/ sma dbab pa'i las ni/ gzhan no/ /spang ba'i las ni/ gzhan no/ /btsun pa/ bsdigs pa'i las su 'os pa zhig la chad pas bcad pa
dang / yid mgu ba dang / dbyung ba'i las bgyis na/ las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma byas pa zhes bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sma dbab pa'i las ni/ gzhan no/ /rnam
par dag pa'i las ni/ gzhan no/ /btsun pa/ ma mthong ba'i slad du spang ba'i las su 'os pa zhig la slar las ma bgyis pa dang / sdig pa la lta ba slar ma btang ba'i slad du
spang pa'i las shig bgyis na/ las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ byas pa zhes bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag thams cad ni/ spang pa'i las so/ /btsun pa/ ma mthong ba'i
phyir spang ba'i las su 'os pa zhig la bsdigs pa dang / smad pa dang / bskrad pa dang / slar sdum pa'i las shig bgyis na/ las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma byas pa zhes bya'o//
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ u pa li/ spang ba'i las ni/ gzhan/ sma dbab pa'i las ni/ gzhan no/ /btsun pa/ ma mthong ba'i slad du spang ba'i las su 'os pa zhig la chad pas bcad pa dang /
yid mgu ba dang / dbyung ba'i las bgyis na/ bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma byas pa zhes bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ u pa li/ spang ba'i las ni/ gzhan no/ /rnam par
dag pa'i las ni/ gzhan no/ /btsun pa/ chad pas gcad par 'os pa zhig la yid mgu ba dang / dbyung ba'i las bgyis na/ las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ byas pa zhes
bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ u pa li/ 'di dag thams cad ni/ rnam par dag pa'i las so/ /btsun pa/ chad pas gcad par 'os pa zhig la bsdigs pa dang / smad pa dang / bskrad pa dang /
slar sdum pa'i las bgyis na/ las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma byas pa zhes bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ u pa li/ rnam par dag pa'i las ni/ gzhan/ sma dbab pa'i las
ni/ gzhan no/ /btsun pa/ chad pas gcad par 'os pa zhig la ma mthong ba'i phyir spang ba'i las bgyis sam/ slar gyi las ma bgyis pa dang / sdig pa la lta ba slar ma btang
ba'i slad du spang ba'i las bgyis na/ las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma byas pa zhes bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ u pa li/ rnam par dag pa'i las ni/
gzhan/ spang ba'i las ni/ gzhan no/ /btsun pa/ las gzhan gyis gsol ba bgyis la/ las gzhan gyis bsgrags na/ las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma byas pa zhes bya
ste/ dge slong de dag kyang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ni/ gang zag byis pa dang / glen pa dang / mi gsal ba dang / mi mkhas pa dang / ngo tsha med pa
dang / tshig mi brtan pa dang / yi dam las nyams pa dang / sngon nyes pa byung ba dang / sngar 'khrugs pa dang / smyon pa dang rnam pa bcus dkrugs kyang 'khrugs par mi 'gyur ro/ /
zhes gsungs na/ btsun pa/ de ste chos bzhin ma lags par las bgyid cing / de dag kyang slar bzlog /slar dkrugs te/ de dag gis slar bzlog /slar dkrugs na/ slar dkrugs
pa mi btsan nam/ u pa li/ btsan te/ ngas chos bzhin gyi las la dgongs te gsungs pas na/ gang la chos bzhin gyi las byed pa de la slar bzlog pa dang / dkrugs pa ni/ mi
btsan no/ /btsun pa/ gang zag bcu gnyis kyi las bsko ba'i tshe dang / bsnyen par rdzogs par rigs pa la bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyid pa'i tshe dbyung bar rigs pa la 'byin pa'i
tshe slar zlog cing slar dkugs te bdag la las ma byed cig /ces mchi na/ de dag gis slar bzlog pa dang / slar dkrugs pa mi btsan nam/ u pa li/ btsan no/ /chad pa'i las
la ngas dgongs te gsungs so/ /btsun pa/ las bgyid pa zhig las bgyid pa'i tshe dus 'das na/ las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ de ste las mang du byas pa de'ang dus 'das
na/ las byas pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ nye bar phyogs pa dang lhan cig kun tu spyad par bgyi'am/ kun tu mi spyad par bgyi/ u pa li/ nye bar phyogs pa dang lhan cig kun tu mi
spyad par bya'o/ /btsun pa/ spangs pa de grogs zhes bgyi'am/ grogs ma lags pa zhes bgyi/ u pa li/ spangs pa thams cad ni/ grogs ma yin pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bsdigs pa'i las bgyis pa la bzod pa stsol cig /ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ gang du bzod pa stsal bar bgyi/ mtshams kyi nang du'o/ /ji ltar bzod pa gsol bar
bgyi/ spu 'greng ba nyal bzhin du dge 'dun la spu bsnyal te 'byung bar rtsol zhing phyag 'tshal bar ston/ mtshams kyi nang du 'dug nas bzod pa gsol te nyes pa mthol ba'o/ /btsun
pa/ su gang la dge 'dun gyi nang du lan gsum du bsgo'ang slar ma btang ba de dag thams cad nongs par 'gyur ram/ su gang la nongs pa byung ba de dag thams cad kyang lan gsum du bsgo bar bgyi
'am/ su gang la zhig dge 'dun gyi nang du lan gsum du bsgo yang slar ma btang ba de dag thams cad la nyes par 'gyur ro/ /nongs pa byung yang de dge 'dun gyi nang
du lan gsum du bsgo mi 'tshal bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ bsgo ba'i rigs pa zhig bsgo bar 'os pa ma gtogs par de las nyes pa gzhan byung ba'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom

ldan 'das kyis ni/ chos gang dang ldan pa'i dge slong de la sma dbab pa'i las dang / spang ba'i las dang / rnam par dag pa'i las rnams bya'o/ /zhes gsungs na/ btsun pa/ de ste dge slong ma la yang de lta
bu'i chos dang ldan par gyur na/ de dag la yang las de rnams bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bya'o/ /btsun pa/ de ste dge slob ma dang / dge tshul ma dang / dge tshul pha rnams chos de dag dang ldan par gyur
na/ de dag la yang las de rnams bgyi'am/ u pa li/ rnam par dag pa'i las ma gtogs par las gzhan rnams ni/ mi bya'o/ /mdor na/ smyon pa sems 'khrugs na ba dang / 'on pa glen pa gnyid
log dang / /ra ro ba dang smyos pa dang / /snyoms zhugs 'gro ba de bzhin mtshan/ /ma ning dag la sogs pa dang / /bslab pa byin pa tha ma'o/ /btsun pa/ smyon pa la las bgyid na/ las bgyis pa
zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ smyon pa la sdom pa byin pa ma gtogs pa'i las lhag ma rnams ni/ de ste slar dge slong du 'du shes yod cing / las 'di ni/ bdag la byed do bar shes na/
las byas ba zhes bya'o/ /sems 'khrugs pa dang / nad kyis gzir ba dang / glen pa dang / lkugs pa dang / 'on pa rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /btsun pa/ gnyid kyis log pa zhig la las bgyid na/ las
bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ de ste lus sam/ ngag gis dmigs nas gsol ba dang / las byas pa'i tshe gnyid log na/ las byas pa zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du myos pa dang / ra ro ba dang /
snyoms par zhugs pa rnams la yang brjod par bya'o/ /btsun pa/ 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa zhig la las bgyid na/ las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ lhung bzed khas dbub pa ma
gtogs te/ lhag ma rnams ni/ byas pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ gang la las bgyid pa de'i mtshan gyur na/ las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ byas pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ ma ning zhig la las
bgyid na/ las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma byas pa zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du dge slong ma sun phyung ba nas sngar 'khrugs pa'i bar du brjod par bya'o/ /btsun pa/ za ma zhig la las bgyid
na/ las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma byas pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa dang / nye bar phyogs pa dang / bslab pa stsal pa rnams la las bgyid na/ las
bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ byas pa zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /mdor na/ smyon pa dang ni sems 'khrugs dang / /na ba 'on pa glen pa dang / /khyim pa dag
la sogs pa dang / /bslab pa byin dang de bzhin mtshan/ /btsun pa/ las bgyid pa smyon pa zhig gis las bgyid na/ bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ ma bgyis
pa zhes bgyi/ u pa li/ de ste dge slong du 'du shes slar rnyed cing gsol ba byas te las ma nyams na/ byas pa zhes bya'o/ /sems 'khrugs pa dang / nad kyis gzir ba dang / glen pa
dang / lkugs pa dang / 'on pa rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /btsun pa/ las bgyid pa 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa zhig gis las bgyis na/ bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ de bzhin
no/ /de bzhin du las bgyid pa khyim pa dang / za ma dang / ma ning dang / lhan cig mi gnas pa dang / so sor gnas pa nas sngar 'khrugs pa'i bar du de dag gis las bgyid na/ las
bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa dang / nye bar phyogs pa dang / bslab pa stsal ba rnams kyis las bgyid na/ las bgyis pa
zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ byas pa zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ las bgyid pas las bgyid pa de mtshan gyur na/ las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/
u pa li/ byas pa zhes bya'o/ /ji ltar las byed pa de bzhin du grangs su bskangs pas kyang brjod par bya'o/ /las kyi dngos po ste/ dmar skya'i dngos po rdzogs so// //
mdor na/ chad pa rnam pa bdun du byas/ /gnas gsum dang ni mu stegs can/ /bsgrags pa dang ni nyes pa dang / /mtshan dang sbyin pa ma yin pa'o/ /btsun pa/ gang zag de nyid chad pa bgyid pa lags
la/ de nyid chad pa 'khor ba yang lags/ de nyid mgu bar spyod pa lags la/ gang zag de nyid kyis yid mgu bar spyad lags par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ de 'di ltar
gang zag yid mgu bar spyad zin pa las dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i nyes pa byung ste/ de dge 'dun la yid mgu bar bya ba gsol te/ dge 'dun gyis de la yid mgu bar bya ba byin te/ de yid mgu bar
bya ba spyod pa na/ de yang dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i nyes pa gnyis byung ste/ gcig ni/ zhag gcig tu bcabs la/ gcig ni/ zhag gnyis su bcabs nas de nyes pa de dag gis phyir dge 'dun las
chad par bya ba gsol pa dang / de la dge 'dun gyis kyang chad par byed pa yin no/ /des zhag gcig tu chad pa byas te de'i nyes pa gcig gi chad pa ni/ byas so/ /gnyis pa'i chad pa ni/ byed/ gsum
du ni/ yid mgu bar bya ba spyod/ /bzhi pa ni/ yid mgu bar bya ba spyad pa'o/ /btsun pa/ chad pa bgyid pa'i rigs pa zhig la yid mgu bar bgyid pa stsal na/ stsal pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/
byin pa zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ chad pa bgyid pa'i rigs pa'i gang zag cig phyung na/ phyung pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ phyung ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun
ni| 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ yid mgu bar bgyid par rigs pa'i gang zag la chad pa bgyid pa stsal na/ stsal pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin
te| dge 'dun yang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ yid mgu bar bgyid par rigs pa'i gang zag cig phyung na/ phyung ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ phyung ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni/
'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ dbyung bar rigs pa'i gang zag la chad pa bgyid du stsal na/ stsal pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin te/ dge 'dun yang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /
btsun pa/ dbyung bar rigs pa'i gang zag cig yid mgu bar bgyid pa stsal na/ stsal pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin te/ dge 'dun yang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ las
bgyid pa phyogs gcig tu mchis la gnas bzhir chad pa bgyid pa dang / yid mgu bar bgyid pa stsol cing dbyung ba'i las kyang bgyid par rung ngam/ u pa li/ de 'di ltar las byed pa'i dge
slong de gnas bzhi'i mtshams su shing ngam/ dbyig pa'am/ re ldes mnan te las byed na/ rung ngo / /btsun pa/ las bgyid pas gnas bzhi'i mtshams su shing ngam/ dbyig pa'am/
re ldes mnan te gsol pa gcig dang / las gcig gis gang zag bzhi la chad pa bgyid pa dang / yid mgu bar bgyid pa dang / dbyung ba'i las rnams bgyid na/ bgyis pa zhes
bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ u pa li/ mtshams gcig pa la mang pos mang po la las byar mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ dge slong zhig gis mtshams gcig na gnas shing
lhan cig tu 'khod pa'i dge slong de dag ma mchis bzhin du chad pa bgyid pa dang / yid mgu bar bgyid pa dang / dbyung ba'i las bgyid kyang nongs par mi 'gyur la/ des dge 'dun la yang mi
mthun par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ dad pa rjes su phul ba'o/ /btsun pa/ las bgyid pa'i dge slong phyogs gcig tu mchis nas gang zag bzhi la chad pa bgyid pa dang /
yid mgu bar bgyid pa'i las bgyid na/ las kyang bgyis par 'gyur la/ dge slong de dag kyang 'das pa dang bcas par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ 'di ltar las byed
pa'i dge slong des mtshams mnan/ mtshams bzung ste mtshams su 'greng ngam/ 'dug kyang rung / gnyis ni/ mtshams kyi nang du bzhag /gnyis ni/ mtshams kyi phyi rol tu bzhag ste byed
pa'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ni/ chad pa bgyid pa gnyis thog gcig pa'i gnas su ma gnas shig /ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ chad pa bgyid pa gnyis thog gcig pa'i
gnas su gnas kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ sngon mu stegs can dang lhan cig gnas na'o/ /btsun pa/ nongs pa gang yang ma byung ba de'ang chad pa
bgyid pa mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ sngon mu stegs can no/ /btsun pa/ dge 'dun gyi lhag ma ma byung ba zhig la chad pa bgyid du stsal kyang nongs par
mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ mu stegs can la'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong zhig gis nongs pa'i ming dang rigs ma bsgrags na/ bcabs pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/
bcabs pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ de ste rigs bsgrags la ming ma bsgrags na/ bcabs pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ dge 'dun gyi lhag ma du las byung / u
pa li/ bcu gsum las so/ /btsun pa/ dge slong zhig gis dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i nongs pa zhig byung la ma bshags shing slar ma bgyis bzhin byang bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa
li/ yod de/ 'di ltar dge slong de thun mong ma yin pa'i dge 'dun gyi lhag ma zhig byung bar gyur la de'i mtshan 'phos te dge slong mar gyur na/ de la dge 'dun gyi lhag ma las ni/
byung gi /nyes byas kyi ltung ba ni/ bshags par bya'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong ma zhig gis dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i nongs pa zhig byung la ma bshags shing slar ma bgyis bzhin byang bar 'gyur
ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ 'di ltar dge slong ma de thung mong ma yin pa'i dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i nyes pa zhig byung bar gyur la de'i mtshan 'phos te dge slong phar gyur na/ dge
'dun gyi lhag ma las ni/ byung gi/ nyes byas kyi ltung ba ni/ bshags par bya'o/ /btsun pa/ dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i nongs pa las byung ba bzhin slar yang nongs pa de bshags par 'gyur
ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ 'di ltar yang dge slong des thun mongs ma yin pa'i dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i nyes pa byung bar gyur pa dang / de'i mtshan 'phos te dge slong mar gyur nas dge
'dun gyi lhag ma byung ba dang / de slar yang mtshan 'phos te dge slong du gyur na/ nyes pa de bshags dgos so/ /btsun pa/ dge slong zhig chad pa spyod pa las de mtshan 'phos te dge slong
mar gyur na/ chad pa bral ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin te/ dge slong ma la chad pa bya'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong de yid mgu bar bgyi ba spyod pa na mtshan 'phos te dge slong mar gyur na/
chad pa bral ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin te/ ji tsam du spyad pa de bgrangs la dge 'dun sde gnyis la zla ba phyed du skongs shig /btsun pa/ dge slong ma zhig chad pa spyod pa na mtshan
'phos te dge slong phar gyur na/ chad pa bral ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin te/ dge slong pha la chad pa byos shig /btsun pa/ dge slong ma zhig yid mgu bar bgyi ba spyod pa na
mtshan 'phos te dge slong phar gyur na/ chad pa bral ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin te/ zhag drug tu bgrangs la phyung zhig /btsun pa/ bslab pa stsal pas dge slong la chad pa
bgyi ba dang / yid mgu bar bgyi ba stsal par rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ bslab pa stsal pa la chad pa bgyi ba dang / yid mgu bar bgyi ba
stsal ba rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /mdor na/ nyes dang de bzhin mtshan mo dang / /skad rnams dang yang bzhi pa dang / /lus dang dben dang de bzhin sngags/ /bzhi pa gnyis dang sbyangs
pa'o/ /btsun pa/ nongs pa dang bcas pas dge slong la chad pa bgyi ba dang / yid mgu bar bgyi ba stsal bar rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ nongs pa dang bcas pa las chad
par bgyi'am/ yid mgu bar bgyi ba spyad du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /de bzhin du grangs su skong ba'ang brjod par bya'o/ /btsun pa/ chad pa bgyid pa bzhi gnas gcig na chad pa bgyid
dam/ yid mgu bar bgyi ba spyod du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ste/ mang pos mang po la chad par bya ba'am/ yid mgu bar bya ba mi spyad do/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ni/ chad pa byed pa
gnas gzhan du ma gnas shig /ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ de ste gnas gzhan du gnas na/ zhag bgrang bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ 'phags pa zhig gis 'phags
pa'i skad du dge slong la nongs par smras pa dang / dge slong des kyang 'phags pa'i skad ma 'tshal na/ smras pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /bcabs par 'gyur ram/ u pa li/ mi
'gyur ro/ /btsun pa/ 'phags pa'i zhig gis mtha' 'khob pa'i skad du dge slong la nongs pa smras pa dang / dge slong des kyang mtha' 'khob pa'i skad ma 'tshal na/ smras pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa
li| ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ mtha' 'khob pa zhig gis mtha' 'khob pa'i skad du dge slong la nongs pa smras pa dang / dge slong des kyang mtha' 'khob pa'i skad ma 'tshal na/ smras pa zhes bgyi'am/
u pa li| ma yin no/ /bcabs par 'gyur ram/ u pa li/ mi 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa/ mtha' 'khob pa zhig gis 'phags pa'i skad du dge slong la nongs pa smras pa dang / dge slong des kyang
'phags pa'i skad ma 'tshal na/ smras pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /bcabs par 'gyur ram/ u pa li/ mi 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa/ nongs pa lus kyis dmigs shing ston na/
smras pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ dben pa la mi dben par 'du shes nas nongs pa smras na/ smras pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /bcabs par 'gyur
ram| u pa li/ mi 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa/ dge slong zhig gis sman nam/ sngags kyis bdag mi snang bar bgyis te nongs pa smras na/ smras pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /bcabs
par 'gyur ram/ u pa li/ mi 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa/ sa la gnas pa dag gis nam mkha' la gnas pa rnams la chad pa bgyi'am/ yid mgu bar bgyi'am/ dbyung ba'i las kyang rung bgyid
na| las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ nam mkha' la gnas pa dag gis sa la gnas pa rnams la chad pa bgyi ba'am/ yid
mgu bar bgyi ba'am/ dbyung ba'i las kyang rung bgyid na/ las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ sa la gnas pa dag gis nam mkha' la gnas pa rnams
kyi grangs su bskangs te chad pa bgyi ba'am/ yid mgu bar bgyi ba'am/ dbyung ba'i las kyang rung bgyid na/ las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ nam
mkha' la gnas pa dag gis sa la gnas pa rnams kyi grangs su bskangs te chad pa bgyi ba'am/ yid mgu bar bgyi ba'am/ dbyung ba'i las kyang rung bgyid na/ las bgyis pa zhes bgyi
ba'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /de bzhin du mtshams kyi nang na gnas pa dang / mtshams kyi phyi rol na gnas pa rnams su lhan cig rnam pa bzhir byos shig// //'dul ba
gzhung dam pa/ bam po nyi shu pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i chos bcu gsum po 'di rnams las/ khu ba las
byung ba zhag gcig bcabs pa nas chig bka' blo mi bde ba las byung ba zhag bcu gsum bcabs pa'i bar du ste/ btsun pa/ nongs pa bcu gsum po de dag dus tha dad pa mi 'dra bar bcabs
pa rnams la gsol ba gcig dang / las gcig gis chad pa bgyid du stsal bar rung ngam/ u pa li/ rung ngo / /btsun pa/ chad pa 'khor nas yid mgu bar bgyid du stsal bar rung ngam/
u pa li/ rung ngo / /yid mgu bar bgyi ba spyad lags pa las/ dbyung ba stsal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ rung ngo / /btsun pa/ dge 'dun gyi lhag ma nongs pa mang po mi 'dra ba las byung ba rnams
gsol pa gcig dang / las gcig gis dus gcig tu gzhan la chad pa bgyid pa dang / gzhan la yid mgu bar bgyid pa dang / gzhan la dbyung ba stsal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo //
btsun pa/ dge 'dun gyi lhag ma nongs pa mang po mi 'dra ba las byung ba rnams gsol ba gcig dang / las gcig gis dus gcig tu gang zag gcig la chad pa dang / yid mgu bar bgyi
pa dang / dbyung ba rnams stsal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /mdor na/ smyon pa sems 'khrugs nad kyis gzir/ /'on glen gnyid log ra ro ba/ /myos dang snyoms zhugs 'gro ba mtshan//
khyim pa dag la sogs pa dang / /bslab pa byin pa tha ma'o/ /btsun pa/ smyon pa zhig gis nongs pa smras na/ smras pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /bcabs par 'gyur ram/ u
pa li| mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du sems 'khrugs pa dang / nad kyis gzir ba rnams so/ /btsun pa/ smyon pa zhig la nongs pa smras na/ smras pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /bcab
pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /de bzhin du sems 'khrugs pa dang / nad kyis gzir ba dang / glen pa dang / 'on pa dang / lkugs pa dang / gnyid
log pa dang / myos pa dang / ra ro ba dang / snyoms par zhugs pa rnams la smras na/ smras pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /bcabs par 'gyur ram/ u pa li/ mi 'gyur ro/ /btsun
pa| 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa zhig la nongs pa smras na/ smras pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ smras pa zhes bya'o/ /bcabs par 'gyur ram/ u pa li/ mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du
ma ning dang / dge slong ma sun phyung ba nas sngar 'khrugs pa'i bar du de dag la nongs pa smras na/ smras pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ smras pa zhes bya'o/ /bcabs par 'gyur ram/ u pa
li| mi 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis za ma zhig la nongs pa smras na/ smras pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ smras pa zhes bya'o/ /bcabs par 'gyur ram/ u pa li/ mi 'gyur ro//
de bzhin du dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa dang / mi gnas pa dang / so sor gnas pa dang / nye bar phyogs pa dang / bslab pa stsal pa rnams la nongs pa smras na/ smras pa zhes
bgyi'am/ u pa li/ smras pa zhes bya'o/ /bcabs par 'gyur ram/ u pa li/ mi 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis nongs pa smra ba na mtshan 'phos na/ smras pa zhes bgyi'am/ u
pa li| smras pa zhes bya'o/ /bcabs par 'gyur ram/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i nongs pa zhig byung na/ nam 'tsho'i bar du dbyung du mi rung ba mchis sam/
u pa li/ yod de/ ji ltar dge slong gis phas pham pa bzhi'i nyes pa las gang yang rung ste/ 'das pa de'i 'og tu dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i nyes pa zhig byung ba'o// //mdor na/
smyon pa sems 'khrugs na ba dang / /'on glen gnyid log ra ro ba/ /myos dang snyoms zhugs 'gro ba mtshan/ /ma ning dag la sogs pa dang / /bslab pa byin pa tha ma'o/ /btsun pa/ smyon pa zhig
la chad pa dang / yid mgu bar bgyi ba dang / dbyung ba'i las rnams bgyid na/ bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ de ste slar dge slong du 'du shes pa de nyid dam/ lus dang ngag gis kyang dmigs
shing / las 'di ni/ bdag la byed par shes na/ las byas pa zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du sems 'khrugs pa dang / nad kyis gzir ba dang / glen pa dang / lkugs pa dang / 'on pa rnams la'ang brjod
par bya'o/ /btsun pa/ gnyid log pa dang / ra ro ba zhig la chad pa dang / yid mgu bar bgyi ba dang / dbyung ba'i las rnams bgyid na/ las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ de ste lus sam/ ngag
gis dmigs pa las gsol pa byed pa'i tshe gnyid kyis log na'ang byas pa zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du ra ro ba dang / myos pa dang / snyoms par zhugs pa rnams la yang brjod par bya'o/ /btsun pa/ 'gro
ba gzhan du gnas pa'i dge slong zhig la chad pa dang / yid mgu bar bgyi ba dang / dbyung ba'ang rung las bgyid na/ las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma
yin no/ /de bzhin du ma ning dang / dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang / mi gnas pa dang / so sor gnas pa nas sngar 'khrugs pa'i bar du brjod par bya'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis za ma zhig la
chad pa dang / yid mgu bar bgyi ba dang / dbyung ba'ang rung las bgyid na/ las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma byas pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa'i dge slong
dang / nye bar phyogs pa dang / bslab pa stsal ba zhig la chad pa dang / yid mgu bar bgyi ba dang / dbyung ba'ang rung las bgyid na/ las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma byas pa zhes bya ste/
dge 'dun dag kyang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /gang zag gi dngos po dang chad pa'i dngos po rdzogs so// //mdor na/ 'phrin pa spring yig lag brda dang / /gzhan zer ba dang
gcig nas gcig /smyon pa sems 'khrugs na ba dang / /'on pa dag dang glen pa dang / /ma ning dag la sogs pa dang / /bslab pa byin pa tha ma'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong zhig gis 'phrin gyis
gso sbyong bkag na/ bkag pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /de bzhin du spring yig dang / lag brda dang / gzhan zer ba dang / gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de gso sbyong bkag
na gso sbyong bkag pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /sems 'khrugs pa dang / nad kyis gzir ba dang / glen pa dang / lkugs pa dang / 'on pa dang / ma ning dang / dge slong ma sun phyung ba
dang / pha dang / ma dang / dgra bcom pa bsad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba dang / mu stegs can dang / mu stegs can du song ba dang / rkun gnas dang / mi
gnas pa dang / so sor gnas pa dang / nye bar phyogs pa dang / sngon nyes pa byung ba dang / sngar 'khrugs pa rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /btsun pa/ bslab pa stsal ba zhig gis gso sbyong bkag na/
gso sbyong bkag pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ za ma zhig gis gso sbyong bkag na gso sbyong bkag pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /mdor na/ smyon par gyur
dang sems 'khrugs dang / /nad kyis gzir dang 'on glen pa/ /gnyid log ra ro myos pa dang / /snyoms par zhugs dang 'gro ba mtshan/ /ma ning dag la sogs pa dang / /bslab pa byin pa tha ma'o/ /
btsun pa/ smyon pa zhig la gso sbyong bkag na/ gso sbyong bkag pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /de bzhin du sems 'khrugs pa dang / nad kyis gzir ba dang / glen pa dang / lkugs
pa dang / 'on pa dang / gnyid log pa dang / ra ro ba dang / myos pa dang / snyoms par zhugs pa la yar brjod par bya'o/ /btsun pa/ 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa zhig la gso sbyong bkag na/ gso
sbyong bkag pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bkag pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ de bzhin du ma ning nas bslab pa stsal pa rnams kyi bar du gso sbyong bkag pa zhes
bgyi'am/ u pa li/ gso sbyong bkag pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ za ma zhig la gso sbyong bkag na/ gso sbyong bkag pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bkag pa zhes bya'o/ /mdor na/ skad dang
lus dang dben dang sngags/ /mig dang rna ba de bzhin te/ /mtshams dang sa dang de bzhin gnas/ /gso sbyong yin te tha ma 'o/ /btsun pa/ 'phags pa zhig gis 'phags pa'i skad du gso sbyong
bkag pa dang / dge slong de dag kyang 'phags pa'i skad ma 'tshal na/ gso sbyong bkag pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /de bzhin du rnam pa bzhir rgyas par bya'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong
zhig gis lus kyis dmigs pas gso sbyong bkag na/ gso sbyong bkag pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ dben pa la mi dben par 'du shes te gso sbyong bkag na/
bkag pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ dge slong zhig gis sngags sam/ sman gyis bdag mi snang bar bgyis te gso sbyong bkag na/ gso sbyong bkag pa zhes bgyi'am/
u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ lha'i mig gis mthong ste gso sbyong bkag na/ gso sbyong bkag pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma bkag pa zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun yang 'das pa dang
bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ lha'i rna bas thos te gso sbyong bkag na/ gso sbyong bkag pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin te/ dge 'dun yang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ mtshams
kyi nang na mchis pas mtshams kyi slad rol na mchis pa rnams la gso sbyong bkag na/ gso sbyong bkag pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ mtshams kyi slad rol na
mchis pa zhig gis mtshams kyi nang na mchis pa rnams la gso sbyong bkag na/ gso sbyong bkag pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ sa la gnas pa zhig gis nam mkha'
la gnas pa rnams kyi gso sbyong bkag na/ gso sbyong bkag pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ nam mkha' la gnas pa zhig gis sa la gnas pa rnams kyi gso sbyong
bkag na/ gso sbyong bkag pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ dge slong zhig phyogs gcig tu mchis nas gnas bzhir gang zag bzhi la gso sbyong bkag par 'gyur ba
mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ /'di ltar dge slong des gnas bzhi'i mtshams su shing ngam/ 'dam bu'am/ re ldes mtshams su mnan te gso sbyong bkag na/ bkag pa zhes bya'o/ /
btsun pa/ dge slong zhig gis dge slong la gso sbyong bkag kyang bkag par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ de bkra shis kyi gso sbyong gdon pa'o/ /mdor na/ gleng ba dran
par bya de bzhin/ /skabs 'byed pa dang smra bar bya/ /lung dbog pa dang 'gog pa dang / /gso sbyong dag dang skabs dbye ba'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs
phye nas gleng bar bya'o/ /dran par bya'o/ /zhes gsungs na/ btsun pa/ skabs phye ba la gleng zhing dran par bgyis na/ nongs pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/
skabs phye ba btang nas gleng ba dang / dran par byas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ chos bzhin du gang du gleng bar bgyi/ dge 'dun gyi nang du'o/ /btsun pa/ chos bzhin du gang du dran par bgyi/ dge
'dun gyi nang du'o/ /btsun pa/ chos bzhin du gang du skabs dbye bar bgyi/ dge 'dun gyi nang du'o/ /btsun pa/ chos bzhin du gang du smra bar bgyi/ dge 'dun gyi nang du'o/ /btsun pa/ chos
bzhin du lung dpog pa gang du dgag par bgyi/ dge 'dun gyi nang du'o/ /btsun pa/ chos bzhin du skabs 'byed pa gang du dgag par bgyi/ dge 'dun gyi nang du'o/ /btsun pa/ skabs
dbye bar gsol ba gang du bgyi/ dge 'dun gyi nang du'o/ /btsun pa/ gang du skabs dbye bar bgyi/ dge 'dun gyi nang du'o/ /btsun pa/ chos bzhin du bgyi ba rnams gang du bgyi/ dge
'dun gyi nang du'o/ /btsun pa/ chos bzhin du rtsod pa gang du bgyi/ dge 'dun gyi nang du'o/ /btsun pa/ chos bzhin gyi yi dam gang du bgyi/ dge 'dun gyi nang du'o/ /btsun pa/ chos
bzhin du gso sbyong dgag pa ni/ du/ chos bzhin ma lags pa ni/ du/ chos bzhin ma yin pa'i gso sbyong dgag pa ni/ gcig go/ chos bzhin pa'ang gcig go /chos bzhin ma yin pa ni/
gnyis te/ chos bzhin pa'ang gnyis so/ /chos bzhin ma yin pa ni/ gsum ste/ chos bzhin pa'ang gsum mo/ /chos bzhin ma yin pa ni/ bzhi ste/ chos bzhin pa'ang bzhi'o/ /chos bzhin
ma yin pa ni/ lnga ste/ chos bzhin pa'ang lnga'o/ /chos bzhin ma yin pa ni/ drug ste/ chos bzhin pa'ang drug go /chos bzhin ma yin pa ni/ bdun te/ chos bzhin pa'ang bdun no/ /chos bzhin ma
yin pa ni/ brgyad de/ chos bzhin pa'ang brgyad do/ /chos bzhin ma yin pa ni/ dgu ste/ chos bzhin pa'ang dgu'o/ /chos bzhin ma yin pa ni/ bcu ste/ chos bzhin pa'ang bcu'o/ /
chos bzhin ma yin pas gso sbyong dgag pa gcig gang zhe na/ byas pa la gzhi med pas gso sbyong 'gog pa ni/ chos bzhin ma yin pa'i gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/ /byas pa la gzhi yod pas
gso sbyong 'gog pa ni/ chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/ /'di ni/ chos bzhin ma yin pa'i gso sbyong 'gog pa gcig dang / chos bzhin yang gcig go /chos bzhin ma yin pa gnyis
dang / chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa gnyis po gang zhe na/ ji ltar yang de ni/ dge slong gis dge slong la byas pa la gzhi med pa dang / ma byas pa la gzhi med pas gso sbyong 'gog
pa ni/ chos bzhin ma yin pa'i gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/ /byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang / ma byas pa la gzhi yod pas gso sbyong 'gog pa ni/ chos bzhin du
gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/ /chos bzhin ma yin pa gsum dang / chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa gsum gang zhe na/ ji ltar yang de ni/ dge slong gis dge slong la byas pa la gzhi med pa dang /
ma byas pa la gzhi med pa dang / byas pa dang ma byas pa la gzhi med pas gso sbyong 'gog pa ni/ chos bzhin ma yin pa'i gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/ /byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang / ma byas pa la
gzhi yod pa dang / byas pa dang ma byas pa la gzhi yod pas gso sbyong 'gog pa ni/ chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/ /chos bzhin ma yin pa bzhi dang / chos bzhin du gso sbyong
'gog pa bzhi gang zhe na/ tshul khrims nyams pa dang / lta ba nyams pa dang / spyod pa nyams pa dang / 'tsho ba nyams pa la gzhi med pa bzhis gso sbyong 'gog pa ni/ chos bzhin ma
yin pa'i gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/ /tshul khrims nyams pa dang / lta ba nyams pa dang / spyod pa nyams pa dang / 'tsho ba nyams pa la gzhi yod pa bzhis gso sbyong 'gog pa ni/ chos
bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/ /chos bzhin ma yin pa lnga dang / chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa lnga po gang zhe na/ phas pham pa dang / dge 'dun gyi lhag ma dang / ltung ba dang / so
sor bshags pa dang / nyes byas rnams la gzhi med pas gso sbyong 'gog pa ni/ chos bzhin ma yin pa'i gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/ /phas pham pa dang / dge 'dun gyi lhag ma dang / ltung ba dang /
so sor bshags pa dang / nyes byas rnams la gzhi yod pas gso sbyong 'gog pa ni/ chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/ /chos bzhin ma yin pa drug dang / chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog
pa drug po gang zhe na/ lhag ma yod pa byas pa la gzhi med pa dang / lhag ma yod pa ma byas pa la gzhi med pa dang / lhag ma yod pa byas pa dang ma byas pa la gzhi med pa dang / lhag ma med
pa byas pa la gzhi med pa dang / lhag ma med pa ma byas pa la gzhi med pa dang / lhag ma med pa byas pa dang ma byas pa la gzhi med pas gso sbyong 'gog pa ni/ chos bzhin ma yin pa'i gso
sbyong 'gog pa'o/ /chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa drug po gang zhe na/ lhag ma yod pa byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang / lhag ma yod pa ma byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang / lhag ma yod pa byas pa dang
ma byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang / lhag ma med pa ma byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang / lhag ma med pa byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang / lhag ma med pa byas pa dang ma byas pa la gzhi yod pas gso sbyong
'gog pa ni/ chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/ /chos bzhin ma yin pa bdun dang / chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa bdun po gang zhe na/ phas pham pa dang / dge 'dun gyi lhag ma
dang / ltung ba dang / so sor bshags pa dang / nyes byas dang / lta ba nyams pa dang / 'tsho ba nyams pa la gzhi med pas gso sbyong 'gog pa ni chos bzhin ma
yin pa'i gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/ /phas pham pa dang / dge 'dun gyi lhag ma dang / ltung ba dang / so sor bshags pa dang / nyes byas dang / lta ba nyams pa dang / 'tsho ba nyams pa la gzhi yod
pas gso sbyong 'gog pa ni chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/ /chos bzhin ma yin pa brgyad dang / chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa brgyad gang zhe na/ tshul khrims nyams pa dang / spyod
pa nyams pa dang / lta ba nyams pa dang / 'tsho ba nyams pas byas pa la gzhi med pa dang / tshul khrims nyams pa dang / lta ba nyams pa dang / spyod pa nyams pa dang / 'tsho ba nyams
par ma byas pa la gzhi med pas gso sbyong 'gog pa ni chos bzhin ma yin pa'i gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/ /tshul khrims nyams pa dang / spyod pa nyams pa dang / lta ba nyams pa dang / 'tsho
ba nyams par byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang / tshul khrims nyams pa dang / lta ba nyams pa dang / spyod pa nyams pa dang / 'tsho ba nyams par ma byas pa la gzhi yod pas gso
sbyong 'gog pa ni chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog ba'o/ /chos bzhin ma yin pa dgu dang / chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa gang zhe na/ lhag ma dang bcas pa byas pa la
gzhi med pa dang / lhag ma dang bcas pa ma byas pa la gzhi med pa dang / lhag ma dang bcas pa byas pa dang ma byas pa la gzhi med pa dang / lhag ma med pa byas pa la gzhi med pa dang / lhag ma
med pa ma byas pa la gzhi med pa dang / lhag ma med pa byas pa dang ma byas pa la gzhi med pa dang / lhag ma med pa dang lhag ma med pa byas pa la gzhi med pa dang / lhag ma dang bcas pa dang
lhag ma med pa ma byas pa la gzhi med pa dang / lhag ma dang bcas pa dang lhag ma med pa byas pa dang ma byas pa la gzhi med pas gso sbyong 'gog pa ni chos bzhin ma yin pa'i gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/ /
lhag ma dang bcas pa byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang / lhag ma dang bcas pa ma byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang / lhag ma dang bcas pa byas pa dang ma byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang / lhag ma med pa
byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang / lhag ma med pa ma byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang / lhag ma med pa byas pa dang ma byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang / lhag ma dang bcas pa dang lhag ma med pa byas
pa la gzhi yod pa dang / lhag ma dang bcas pa dang lhag ma med pa ma byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang / lhag ma dang bcas pa dang lhag ma med pa byas pa dang ma byas pa la gzhi yod pas gso sbyong
'gog pa ni chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/ /chos bzhin ma yin pa bcu dang / chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa bcu gang zhe na/ phas pham pa yin/ phas pham pa'i gtam la zhugs
pa yin/ tshul khrims nyams pa yin/ lta ba nyams pa yin/ spyod pa nyams pa yin/ 'tsho ba nyams pa yin/ bslab pa phul ba yin/ bslab pa phul ba'i
gtam la zhugs pa yin/ dge 'dun la dpyas 'dogs pa yin/ dge 'dun la dpyas 'dogs pa'i gtam la zhugs pa yin no/ /de la ji ltar na/ phas pham pa yin zhe na/ gang gi
rnam pa dang / gang gi tshul dang / gang gi mtshan mas dge slong phas pham pa'i nyes pa byung ba de'i rnam pa dang / de'i tshul dang / de'i mtshan mas dge slong phas pham pa'i nyes pa byung
par mthong ba yin no/ /de des mthong bas gso sbyong 'gog pa ni/ chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa yin te/ de ltar na/ phas pham pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ phas pham pa'i gtam la
zhugs pa yin zhe na/ ji ltar yang de ni/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol yang rung / dge slong mang po 'dus shid 'khod par gyur pa rnams kyang de las byung ba/ de
dang mthun pa/ de'i rang bzhin gyi gtam la zhugs pa yin te/ dad pa las thos kyang rung / bdag rang rnam pa la dogs pa skyes kyang rung ste/ de des thos pa dang / dogs pas gso sbyong
'gog pa ni/ chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/ /ji ltar na/ tshul khrims nyams pa yin zhe na/ phas pham pa bzhi las gang yang rung phas pham pa shin tu 'das par gyur pa'o/ /ji
ltar na/ lta ba nyams pa yin zhe na/ lta ba drug cu rtsa gnyis las gang yang rung ste/ lta bar 'gyur ba rab tu thob pa yin no/ /ji ltar na spyod pa nyams par gyur pa yin zhe na/ mi spyod pa rnams
spyod pa ste/ dge slong gi bslab pa rnams la mi slob pa'o/ /ji ltar na/ 'tsho ba nyams pa yin zhe na/ 'tsho ba yongs su ma dag pa yin no/ /ji ltar bslab pa phul ba yin zhe na/ gang gi rnam pa dang /
gang gi tshul dang / gang gi mtshan mas dge slong bslab pa 'bul bde'i rnam pa dang / de'i tshul dang / de'i mtshan mas dge slong du mthong ba yin te/ de des mthong nas gso sbyong 'gog pa ni/
chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/ /ji ltar na/ bslab pa phul ba'i gtam la zhugs pa yin zhe na/ ji ltar yang de ni/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol na'ang rung /
dge slong rnams 'dus te 'khod pa de dag kyang de las byung ba/ de dang mthun pa/ de'i rang bzhin gyi gtam la zhugs pa yin te/ dad pa las thos kyang rung / bdag nyid rnam pa la dogs pa
skyes kyang rung ste/ de des thos pa dang / de'i dogs pas gso sbyong 'gog pa ni/ chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/ /ji ltar na/ dge 'dun la dpyas 'dogs pa yin zhe na/ gang gi
rnam pa dang / gang gi tshul dang / gang gi mtshan mas dge slong gi dge 'dun la smod pa de lta bu'i rnam pa dang / de lta bu'i tshul dang / de lta bu'i mtshan mas dge 'dun la smod pa'i dge
slong du mthong ba yin te/ de des mthong nas gso sbyong 'gog pa ni/ chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/ /ji ltar na/ dge 'dun la dpyas 'dogs pa'i gtam la
zhugs pa yin zhe na/ ji ltar yang de ni/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol tu'ang rung / dge slong rnams 'dus te 'khod pa de dag kyang de las byung ba/ de dang
mthun pa/ de'i rang bzhin gyi gtam la zhugs pa yin te/ dad pa las thos kyang rung / bdag rang rnam pa la dogs pa skyes kyang rung ste/ de des thos pa dang / de lta bu'i dogs pas gso
sbyong 'gog pa ni/ chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/ /chos bzhin bcu po 'di dag ldog pa ni/ chos bzhin ma yin par sbyar bar bya'o/ /gso sbyong dgag pa'i dngos po rdzogs
so// //mdor na/ dge tshul lo ma lon pa gcig /kha dog ngan dang gnas de bzhin/ /ma bskos pa dang phyag bya ba/ /mngon sum rdul gzan med pa'o/ /btsun pa/
dge tshul pha nyi tshe dbyar tshul du zhugs na/ de dag gis mal stan bgo bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /de dag gis mal stan blang bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ blang bar ni/
bya'o/ /btsun pa/ lo ma lon pa dag cig nyi tshe dbyar tshul du zhugs na/ de dag gis mal stan bgo bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /de dag gis mal stan blang bar bgyi'am/
u pa li/ blang bar ni/ bya'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ bzhi dbyar tshul du zhugs na/ de dag gis mal stan bgo bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/
de dag gis mal stan blang bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ blang bar ni/ bya'o/ /u pa li/ gang du dge slong lnga'am/ de las lhag par gnas na/ de dag gis gsol ba byas la mal stan bged
ba skos shig /bskos pa des mal stan bgo'o/ /btsun pa/ mal stan de nyid spyad pas nongs par 'gyur ba dang / de nyid spyad pas nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/
gang zag gis mal stan kha dog ngan par ma gyur pa'am/ kha tshar ring ba spyad na/ nyes pa dang bcas pa'o/ /dge 'dun gyi spyad na/ nyes pa med do/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge
slong gis dge 'dun gyi mal stan gnas gzhan du khyer zhing ma spyod cig /ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ dge slong zhig gis dge 'dun gyi mal stan gnas gzhan du 'tshal te spyad na/ cir

'gyur/ nyes byas so/ /bar chad brgyad las gang yang rung ste bar chad gcig byung bar gyur pa dang / gnas de nyid du mal stan srung bar mi nus pa dang / gnas der mi gnas par sdom pa bcas pa la ni/ nyes
pa med do/ /btsun pa/ ma bskos pas ma la stan bgo bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ dge slong zhig gis dge 'dun gyi mal stan de nyid spyad na/ nongs par 'gyur ba
dang / de nyid spyad pas nongs par mi 'gyur ba ma chis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ spu phyir zlog ste gyon na/ nyes pa dang bcas pa'o/ /bting na/ nyes pa med do//
rdul gzan med par gyon na/ nyes pa dang bcas pa'o/ /rdul gzan dang bcas par gyon na/ nyes pa med do/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad du nye bar phyogs pa dang
gnas par mi bya'o/ /zhes gsungs na/ btsun pa/ ci/ nye bar ma phyogs pas nye bar phyogs pa rgan pa la yang phyag bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin te/ nye bar phyogs pa thams cad kyis
nye bar ma phyogs pa rnams la phyag byos shig /dge slong rnams kyi tha mar gzhag go /btsun pa/ ci/ de dag la mal stan kyang dge slong de dag gi tha mar stsal tam/ u pa li/ nye bar phyogs
pa la rnyed pa dang mal stan byin pa med do/ /btsun pa/ mngon sum du ma gyur pa la mal stan stsal par bgyi'am/ kha cig la byin cig /kha cig la ma sbyin cig /gang la stsal bar bgyi/ song
nas phyir 'ong ba la ni/ byin cig /su la mi stsal/ song nas phyir 'ong ba la ni/ ma sbyin cig /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi rdzas rdul gzan ma mchis par ma spyad
cig /ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi rdzas rdul gzan ma mchis par spyad kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis dam/ a pa li/ yod de/ ji ltar yang de ni/ khyim bdag
gcig gis g.yogs pa'am bgo ba zhig rdul gzan med par spyad par dge 'dun la phul ba yin no/ /mdor na/ kun dga' bo dang gang zag dang / /de ltar phyag dang rung ba dang / /tha ma dbyar du gnas pa
dang / /sum cha dbri ba de bzhin te/ /khyim pa dag la sogs pa dang / /bslab pa byin pa tha ma 'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo khyod kyis mal stan lhag ma rnams bgos shig /ces
gsungs na/ lhag pa gang lags/ gang gcig dang / gnyis po'i phyogs las lhag par gyur pa'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi mal stan rdul gzan ma mchis par
ma spyad cig /ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ dge slong gang zag gis mal stan spyad na/ cir 'gyur/ nyes byas so/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang dge slong glo bur du lhags pa dang / gzhi pa
rnams ji ltar rgan rim bzhin phyag byos shig /ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ de ste chad pa bgyid pa'i dge slong rgan pa la'ang phyag bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ u pa li/ phyag
bya ba'i mi rigs pa thams cad la phyag mi bya ste/ 'khon yod pa ni/ ma gtogs so/ /u pa li/ dge 'dun gyi nang na phyag bya ba'i mi rigs pa'i gang zag rnams gang zhe na/ bsdigs pa'i las
byas pa dang / smad pa'i las byas pa dang / bskrad pa'i las byas pa dang / slar sdum pa'i las byas pa dang / ma mthong ba'i phyir spang ba'i las byas pa dang / las slar mi byed pa'i phyir spang
ba'i las byas pa dang / sdig pa la lta ba slar ma sbangs pa'i phyir spang ba'i las byas pa dang / chad pa byed pa dang / gzhi nas bslangs te chad pa byed pa dang / chad pa
'khor ba dang / yid mgu bar bya ba spyod pa dang / gzhi nas bslangs te yid mgu bar bya ba spyod pa dang / khyim pa dang / ma ning dang / dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang / pha dang / ma dang / dgra
bcom pa bsad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba dang / mu stegs can dang / mu stegs can du song ba dang / rkun gnas dang / mi gnas pa dang / so sor gnas pa dang /
sngar nyes pa byung ba dang / sngon 'khrugs pa dang / nye bar phyogs pa dang / bslab pa stsal pa dang / dge slong ma dang / dge slob ma dang / dge tshul pha dang / dge tshul ma dang / shin tu

gzhon pa rnams la phyag ma byed cig /bshang ba byed pa la phyag mi bya'o/ /bshang ba byed pas phyag mi bya'o/ /gci ba byed pa la phyag mi bya'o/ /gci ba byed pas phyag mi bya'o/ /so shing za ba la phyag

mi bya'o/ /so shing za bas phyag mi bya'o/ /zas za ba la phyag mi bya'o/ /zas za bas phyag mi bya'o/ /'thung ba la phyag mi bya'o/ /'thung bas phyag mi bya'o/ /sgren mo la phyag mi bya'o/ /sgren mos phyag mi bya'o//
gos gcig pa la phyag mi bya'o/ /gos gcig pas phyag mi bya'o/ /mi snang bar 'dug pas phyag mi bya'o/ /mi bde bar 'dug pa la phyag mi bya'o/ /mi bde bar 'dug pas phyag mi bya'o/ /lung nod pa
la zhugs pa'am/ yid la byed pa la zhugs pa'am/ chos nyan par zhugs pa la phyag mi bya'o/ /lung nod pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / chos nyan par zhugs pas phyag mi bya'o/ /yengs pa la phyag
mi bya'o/ /khyim gyi nang du zhugs pa la phyag mi bya ste/ gang zag 'di dag ni/ phyag bya bar mi rigs pa'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong zhig gis dge 'dun gyi khri'am/ khri'u la mchis sam/ nyal yang
nongs pa ltung bar mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ mi rung ba la 'dug gam/ nyal ba ste/ gang dge slong rnams kyis spyad par mi rung ba'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang chad
pa bgyid pa'i dge slong ni/ dge slong rnams kyis tha mar stsal tam/ u pa li/ ma yin te/ rim gyis sbyin no/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang dbyar med pa dang / rang bzhin du gnas pa
rnams la mal stan sngar byin cig /de'i 'og tu spangs pa'i rnams la'o/ /zhes gsungs na/ de ste mal stan lhag par gyur na/ rang bzhin du gnas pa dang lhan cig tu stsal tam/ u pa li/ mi sbyin no//
btsun pa/ dge slong zhig gis gnas bzhi nas mal stan blangs kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ ji ltar yang de ni/ dge slong zhig gis gnas bzhi'i mtshams shing
ngam/ 'dam bu'am/ re ldes mnan te dbyar tshul du zhugs pa yin no/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge tshul pha rnams ni/ rnyed pa'i sum cha byin cig /ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ ci/
mal stan yang sum cha stsal tam/ u pa li/ ma yin te/ skal pa mnyam par byin cig /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang dge slong gsar bu rnams kyis
rgan po rnams las sngon du mal stan ma blang zhig /ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ dge slong gzhon nus rgan pa las sngar mal stan blangs kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/
gang gis dge 'dun las gnas kyi gnang ba thob pa dang / nye g.yog gi gnang ba thob pa yin/ 'jigs pa'i sa nas thos te 'ongs pa yin no/ /btsun pa/ khyim pa mal stan 'god par bsko'am
u pa li/ ma yin no/ /de bzhin du zam nas bslab pa stsal pa'i bar du rgyas par mal stan 'god par bsko'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ smyon pa mal stan 'god par bsko'am/
u pa li/ ma yin no/ /de bzhin du sems 'khrugs pa dang / nad kyis gzir ba dang / glen pa dang / lkugs pa dang / 'on pa rnams so/ /btsun pa/ 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa dag mal stan
'god par bsko'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ ma ning la mal stan stsal tam/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /de bzhin du dge slong ma sun phyung ba nas sngar 'khrugs pa'i bar du de dag la
mal stan stsal tam/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa dang / bslab pa stsal pa la mal stan stsal tam/ u pa li/ byin cig /btsun pa/ smyon pa la
mal stan stsal tam/ u pa li/ de ste spyad pa bzhin du mi spyad na/ ma spyin cig /de bzhin du sems 'khrugs pa dang / nad kyis gzir ba dang / glen pa dang / lkugs pa dang /
'on pa rnams la yang brjod par bya'o/ /btsun pa/ mal stan 'god par dge slong bsko ba'i tshe mtshan 'phos na/ bskos pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bskos pa zhes bya'o/ /des mal
stan bsko bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /mal stan gyi dngos po rdzogs so// //'du ba gzhung dam pa/ bam po nyer gcig pa/ mdor na/ gsum du byas pa'i gzu
bo dang / /rnam par zhi ba'i mtshan de bzhin/ /gso sbyong dag gi mngon sum dag /'byung ba dag kyang de bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ gzu
bo chos du dang ldan na/ 'dul ba 'dzin cing rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar bgyid nas pa lags/ u pa li/ bcu gcig ste/ bcu gcig gang zhe na/ rtsod pa shes/ rtsod pa ci la byung ba shes/
rtsod pa bsdu ba shes/ rtsod pa rnam par zhi ba shes/ rtsod pa shin tu zhi bas phyis mi 'byung bar shes/ 'byung ba shes/ bcas pa shes/ rdzes su bcas pa shes/ dgag pa shes/ mngon
par rjes su gnang ba shes/ las byas pa dang ma byas pa shes pa ste/ u pa li/ chos bcu gcig po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i gzu bo ni/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar byed nus
pa yin no/ /gzhan yang chos bcu gcig ste/ bcu gcig po gang zhe na/ nyes pa shes/ nyes pa med pa shes/ nyes pa lci ba shes/ nyes pa yang
ba shes/ nyes pa byung ba shes/ nyes pa las dbyung ba shes/ 'dod pa'i phyir mi 'gro/ zhe sdang dang / 'jigs pa dang / gti mug gi phyir mi 'gro ba dang / chad pa'i las
bya ba dang mi bya ba shes pa ste/ u pa li/ bcu gcig po 'di dag gis rnam par zhi bar bya ba'i bar du rgyas par ro/ /gzhan yang chos bcu gcig gi bar du ste/ bcu gcig
po gang zhe na/ mdo sde la mkhas pa yin/ 'dul ba la mkhas pa yin/ rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa yin/ lung la zhugs pa yin/ mdo sde 'byed pa yin/
'khrul ba mi 'dzin pa yin/ gsang ba'i tshig mi 'dzin pa yin/ gdon mi za bar 'dzin pa yin/ tshig mang po mi 'dzin pa yin/ dam bcas pa 'dzin pa yin/ lan
gsum gyi bar du gzhog pa yin te/ u pa li/ chos bcu gcig po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i gzu bo ni/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar byed nus pa yin no/ /chos
du dang ldan pas rtsod pa shin tu zhi ba lags/ u pa li/ nyi shu rtsa gcig ste/ nyi shu rtsa gcig po gang zhe na/ dge 'dun la bsgo ba yin/ chos dang bcas pas rgyal po'i
bka' dang mthun pa yin/ phyogs dang pha rol gyi phyogs kyi dge slong dag go bar byed pa yin/ rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i dge slong la chos dang mthun pas rgol ba dang / phyir rgol
ba'i dge slong la 'dul ba ma nyams par byed pa yin/ mi gtsang ba'i gang zag gi nyes pa dang ma bcas pa yin/ byung ba chud ma gsan pa yin/ bcas pa chud ma gsan pa yin/
rjes su bcas pa chud ma gsan pa yin/ dgag pa chud ma gsan pa yin/ mngon par rjes su gnang ba chud ma gsan pa yin/ nyes pa chud ma gsan pa yin/ rgol ba'i dge slong gi
yi dam shin tu bzung ba yin/ lan 'debs pa'i yi dam shing tu bzung ba yin/ mdo sde'i tshig kyang bstan pa yin/ 'dul ba dang mthun pa yin/ chos kyi mig rjes su bzung
ba yin/ bskos nas rnam par zhi bar byed pa yin/ nyes pa ston pa yin/ chad pa'i las dmigs su bab pa yin/ rnam par dag pa ston pa yin/ chos dang / 'dul ba dang / ston
pa'i bstan pas rtsod pa rnam par zhi ba yin te/ u pa li/ chos nyi shu rtsa gcig po 'di rnams dang ldan na/ rtsod pa rnam par zhi ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ rgol ba'am/ slar rgol
ba'i dge slong mtshan 'phos na/ rtsod bzhi ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ zhi ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rtsod pa byung ba byung ma thag tu rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa'i chos
bdun gyis rnam par zhi bar bya'o/ /zhes gsungs na/ btsun pa/ rtsod pa rnam pa bzhi las gang yang rung ste/ rtsod pa zhig byung na/ rtsod pa zhi bar bgyid
